translated: The meditation of those who have the cause of the consciousness that, having ascertained the meaning, is set in the mind and is established is meditation on the meaning that is ascertained by the mind.üîΩThe meditation

original: dper na 'jigs pa dang mya ngan la sogs pa gsal ba nyid du snang ba bzhin na'o //
analyzed: dper na 'jigs pa dang mya ngan la sogs pa gsal ba nyid du snang ba bzhin na'o //
translated: For example, it is like the appearance of fear, sorrow, and so on.

original: 'dis ni gsal bar snang ba nyid dang bsgoms pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por tshad mar mthong ba'i yul bstan te /
analyzed: 'dis ni gsal bar snang ba nyid dang bsgoms pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por tshad mar mthong ba'i yul bstan te /
translated: This shows that the object of the valid cognition that sees the fact of cause and effect is the appearance of clarity.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni der nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni der nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the fact of cause and effect is ascertained in that.

original: gang zhig gsal bar snang ba de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no zhes gsal bar snang ba nyid rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rgyur brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig gsal bar snang ba de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no zhes gsal bar snang ba nyid rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rgyur brjod pa yin no //
translated: That which appears clearly is nonconceptual. This states that the appearance of clarity is the cause of nonconceptuality.

original: phyin ci ma log pa ste bden pa'i yul can gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa ste bden pa'i yul can gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is nonerroneous, that is, it has a true object.

original: 'dis ni tshig le'ur byas pa las gang zhig slu ba med pa can gyi sgrar brjod pa ma 'khrul pa nyid brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni tshig le'ur byas pa las gang zhig slu ba med pa can gyi sgrar brjod pa ma 'khrul pa nyid brjod pa yin no //
translated: This explains the nondeceptive nature of the words in the kƒÅrikƒÅ.

original: des na bsgoms pa las gsal bar snang ba nyid yin @118a * //
analyzed: des na bsgoms pa las gsal bar snang ba nyid yin @118a * //
translated: Therefore, the appearance of clarity is from meditation.

original: la ; des na rnam par mi rtog pa yin zhing tshad ma'i yul bsgoms pas kyang 'khrul pa med pa nyid ni rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum du bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: la ; des na rnam par mi rtog pa yin zhing tshad ma'i yul bsgoms pas kyang 'khrul pa med pa nyid ni rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum du bstan pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is non-conceptual, and since it is cultivated as the object of valid cognition, it is also non-erroneous. This is the yogi‚Äôs direct perception.

original: mngon sum gzhan bzhin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gzhan bzhin no //
translated: Like other direct perceptions.

original: mngon sum gzhan yang 'di lta bur gyur pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gzhan yang 'di lta bur gyur pa kho na yin no //
translated: Other direct perceptions are just like this.

original: yang 'di 'dra ba'i mngon sum de gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang 'di 'dra ba'i mngon sum de gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is this kind of direct perception?

original: bshad pa / 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa bzhi la /
analyzed: bshad pa / 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa bzhi la /
translated: It is said: The four noble truths of the noble ones.

original: 'bras bur gyur pa nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: 'bras bur gyur pa nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sdug bsngal lo //
translated: The five appropriated aggregates that are the result are suffering.

original: de dag nyid sred pa dang lhan cig pas rgyur gyur pa ni kun 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de dag nyid sred pa dang lhan cig pas rgyur gyur pa ni kun 'byung ngo //
translated: Those same aggregates together with craving are the origin.

original: nges par legs pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i sems ni 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: nges par legs pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i sems ni 'gog pa'o //
translated: The mind that has the nature of definite goodness is cessation.

original: rang bzhin de nyid thob pa'i rgyur gyur ba bdag med pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi sems kyi khyad par ni lam mo //
analyzed: rang bzhin de nyid thob pa'i rgyur gyur ba bdag med pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi sems kyi khyad par ni lam mo //
translated: The mind that has the aspect of selflessness and so on, which is the cause for attaining that nature, is the path.

original: 'di dag mthong bar mngon sum du byed pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de mngon sum yin pa de bzhin du de dang 'dra ba'i don can gyi rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa mtha' dag mngon sum gyi tshad ma nyid do //
analyzed: 'di dag mthong bar mngon sum du byed pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de mngon sum yin pa de bzhin du de dang 'dra ba'i don can gyi rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa mtha' dag mngon sum gyi tshad ma nyid do //
translated: Whatever consciousness directly perceives these is direct perception. In the same way, all yogic consciousnesses that have objects similar to those are direct valid knowledge.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams ji ltar tshad mas rnam par dag pa dang / mi rtag pa la sogs pa de dag rnam pa ji lta bu zhig bsgom par bya ba dang / skye ba brgyud pa du mas dus ji srid kyi mthar thug par goms par bya ba dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams ji ltar tshad mas rnam par dag pa dang / mi rtag pa la sogs pa de dag rnam pa ji lta bu zhig bsgom par bya ba dang / skye ba brgyud pa du mas dus ji srid kyi mthar thug par goms par bya ba dang /
translated: How are the four noble truths purified by valid knowledge? What are the aspects of impermanence, etc., that are to be cultivated? For how long, in terms of many lifetimes, should one cultivate them?

original: rgyu gang la goms par byed pa byang chus sems dpa' rnams kyi ni snying rje las yin la /
analyzed: rgyu gang la goms par byed pa byang chus sems dpa' rnams kyi ni snying rje las yin la /
translated: The cause of cultivation for bodhisattvas is compassion.

original: de la gzhan rnams ni 'khor ba las yid byung ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de thams cad ni /
analyzed: de la gzhan rnams ni 'khor ba las yid byung ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de thams cad ni /
translated: In that regard, all others are said to be disenchanted with sa·πÉsƒÅra.

original: ji ltar tshad ma rnam 'grel du gtan la phab pa'i rnam pa de nyid kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong ba thabs dang bcas /
analyzed: ji ltar tshad ma rnam 'grel du gtan la phab pa'i rnam pa de nyid kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong ba thabs dang bcas /
translated: Just as it is determined in the Pramanavarttika, the method for seeing the noble truths is to understand them with their objects,

original: yul dang bcas /
analyzed: yul dang bcas /
translated: with their domain,

original: rnam pa dang bcas par khong du chud par byas te /
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas par khong du chud par byas te /
translated: and with their aspects.

original: 'dir ni yang dag pa'i yul can gyi rnam par rtog pa goms pa las de'i don la dmigs pa'i mngon sum skye ba nyid do zhes bya ba de tsam zhig bsgrubs par 'dod pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: 'dir ni yang dag pa'i yul can gyi rnam par rtog pa goms pa las de'i don la dmigs pa'i mngon sum skye ba nyid do zhes bya ba de tsam zhig bsgrubs par 'dod pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: Here, it is merely asserted that the direct perception that focuses on their object arises from the cultivation of the correct conceptual consciousness that has their object.

original: 'di snyam du gang gis 'jigs sogs bzhin du zhes de skad brjod par 'gyur ba bsgoms pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi yid kyi shes pa 'jigs pa la sogs pa gsal bar snang ba gang du mthong zhe na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du gang gis 'jigs sogs bzhin du zhes de skad brjod par 'gyur ba bsgoms pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi yid kyi shes pa 'jigs pa la sogs pa gsal bar snang ba gang du mthong zhe na /
translated: One might ask, ‚ÄúWhat is the mental consciousness that is preceded by meditation and that clearly perceives fear and so on, which is referred to in the line ‚ÄòJust like fear and so on‚Äô?‚Äù

original: bshad pa / 'dod pa dang 'jigs pa dang mya ngan dang de dag gis brlams pa gang yin pa de ni de dag gis brlams pa ste /
analyzed: bshad pa / 'dod pa dang 'jigs pa dang mya ngan dang de dag gis brlams pa gang yin pa de ni de dag gis brlams pa ste /
translated: The answer is that those who desire, fear, or grieve and those who are possessed by them are possessed by desire, fear, and so on.

original: de dang chom @118b rkun gyi rmi lam mo //
analyzed: de dang chom @118b rkun gyi rmi lam mo //
translated: and the dream of a thief.

original: rmi lam gang du chom rkun mngon du lhags par mthong ba de ni chom rkun rmi lam mo //
analyzed: rmi lam gang du chom rkun mngon du lhags par mthong ba de ni chom rkun rmi lam mo //
translated: The dream in which one sees a thief approaching is the dream of a thief.

original: de la sogs pa rnam pa gzhan gang yin pa de ni chom rkun rmi sogs te /
analyzed: de la sogs pa rnam pa gzhan gang yin pa de ni chom rkun rmi sogs te /
translated: The other kinds of dreams are like the dream of a thief.

original: des bslad pa'o //
analyzed: des bslad pa'o //
translated: One is affected by them.

original: yod pa ma yin yang mdun na ni ste sngon na gnas pa bzhin du'o //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin yang mdun na ni ste sngon na gnas pa bzhin du'o //
translated: Although they do not exist, they appear as if they were present in front of one.

original: 'dis ni mthong ba de gsal bar snang ba bshad pa yin no //üîΩ'dir ni 'dod pa la sogs pas brlams pa'i gnas skabs su dmag nang na gnas pa'am /
analyzed: 'dis ni mthong ba de gsal bar snang ba bshad pa yin no // 'dir ni 'dod pa la sogs pas brlams pa'i gnas skabs su dmag nang na gnas pa'am /
translated: This explains the appearance of the dream.

original: dus pa la sogs pa'i mya ngan gyis mdongs par gyur pa'i gsal bar snang ba'i shes pa skyes pa gang yin pa de /
analyzed: dus pa la sogs pa'i mya ngan gyis mdongs par gyur pa'i gsal bar snang ba'i shes pa skyes pa gang yin pa de /
translated: Here, when one is affected by desire, etc., the consciousness that arises, whether one is in the midst of battle or in the midst of grief, etc.,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yin par nges nus kyi gzhan du na snang ba dang bcas par mig gdangs pa'i dbang po'i 'khrul pa yang srid pa yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yin par nges nus kyi gzhan du na snang ba dang bcas par mig gdangs pa'i dbang po'i 'khrul pa yang srid pa yin no //
translated: is definitely mental consciousness. Otherwise, it would be possible that the error of the sense faculty with open eyes would have an appearance.

original: 'dir ni bsgoms pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i yid gsal bar snang ba nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi dbang po las skyes ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni bsgoms pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i yid gsal bar snang ba nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi dbang po las skyes ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Here, the mind that arises from the cause of meditation is established as clear appearance, but it does not arise from the sense faculties.

original: dbang po las skyes pa gsal bar snang ba la ni rtsod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po las skyes pa gsal bar snang ba la ni rtsod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no dispute that what arises from the sense faculties is clear appearance.

original: bstan du zin kyang des ni rnal 'byor pa'i yid kyi shes pa gsal bar snang bar brjod par nus pa ma yin no //üîΩ'di snyam du dbang po nyams pa gang yin pa de la ni rab rib can bzhin du dbang po las skyes pa 'ga' zhig la 'khrul par 'gyur ba yin gyi dngos po gzhan la ni mi gsal bar mthong ba yin na 'dod pas brlams pa ni 'ga' zhig
analyzed: bstan du zin kyang des ni rnal 'byor pa'i yid kyi shes pa gsal bar snang bar brjod par nus pa ma yin no // 'di snyam du dbang po nyams pa gang yin pa de la ni rab rib can bzhin du dbang po las skyes pa 'ga' zhig la 'khrul par 'gyur ba yin gyi dngos po gzhan la ni mi gsal bar mthong ba yin na 'dod pas brlams pa ni 'ga' zhig
translated: Even if it were taught, it would not be possible to say that the clear appearance of the yogi‚Äôs mental consciousness is due to that.

original: tu yang zhan par mthong ba yod pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: tu yang zhan par mthong ba yod pa ma yin pas /
translated: If one thinks, ‚ÄúFor those with impaired sense faculties, like those with cataracts, there is delusion regarding some things that arise from the sense faculties, but other things are seen unclearly. However, those who are possessed by desire do not see anything as inferior.

original: de ni dbang po'i 'khrul pa ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: de ni dbang po'i 'khrul pa ma yin no snyam na /
translated: Therefore this is not a delusion of the sense faculties,‚Äù

original: de ni de ltar snying po yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni de ltar snying po yod pa ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: brlams pa'i dbang gis mi bden pa bsgoms pa'i dngos po gcig pu nyid dbang po las gsal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir snga ma kho na kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: brlams pa'i dbang gis mi bden pa bsgoms pa'i dngos po gcig pu nyid dbang po las gsal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir snga ma kho na kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no //
translated: Because of the power of the influence of sleep, the object of the meditation, which is not real, appears clearly to the sense faculty. Therefore, the former is not faulty.

original: chom rkun gyi rmi lam gyis bslad pa ni gnyid las langs pa nyid la 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: chom rkun gyi rmi lam gyis bslad pa ni gnyid las langs pa nyid la 'dod pa yin te /
translated: The one who is affected by the dream of a thief desires to rise from sleep.

original: gnyid log pa'i gnas skabs na ni gsal bar snang ba rnam pa du ma yang yod pa yin te /
analyzed: gnyid log pa'i gnas skabs na ni gsal bar snang ba rnam pa du ma yang yod pa yin te /
translated: In the state of sleep, there are many appearances that are clear.

original: de'i phyir khyad par du brjod pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par du brjod pas ci zhig bya /
translated: Therefore, what is the use of specifying?

original: gnyid kyis nyams pa'i rgyus yid gsal bar snang bar gyur du zin kyang bsgoms pa'i rgyu las gsal bar snang bar brjod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnyid kyis nyams pa'i rgyus yid gsal bar snang bar gyur du zin kyang bsgoms pa'i rgyu las gsal bar snang bar brjod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Even if the mind appears to be clear due to the cause of the impairment of sleep, it is not said to appear clearly due to the cause of meditation.

original: snang ba'i khyad par de ni bslad pa'i rgyu can yin gyi bsgoms pa'i rgyu can ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba'i khyad par de ni bslad pa'i rgyu can yin gyi bsgoms pa'i rgyu can ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that difference in appearance has a cause of impairment, but it does not have a cause of meditation.

original: des na chom rkun gyi rmi lam las langs ma thag pa nyid du mig mi @119a * //
analyzed: des na chom rkun gyi rmi lam las langs ma thag pa nyid du mig mi @119a * //
translated: Therefore, immediately after rising from the dream of a thief, the eyes are not clear.

original: gsal bar phye ba'am /
analyzed: gsal bar phye ba'am /
translated: It is clearly distinguished.üîΩüîΩ

original: mun pa'i nang du bslad pa gang yin pa da 'dir gzung ba yin no //
analyzed: mun pa'i nang du bslad pa gang yin pa da 'dir gzung ba yin no //
translated: The defilement that is in the darkness is apprehended here.

original: yang de dag gis de mdun na gnas pa bzhin du mthong ba zhes bya ba 'di gang las she na /
analyzed: yang de dag gis de mdun na gnas pa bzhin du mthong ba zhes bya ba 'di gang las she na /
translated: And from what is it that they see it as if it were standing before them?üîΩIt is said:

original: bshad pa / bslad pa ji bzhin te /
analyzed: bshad pa / bslad pa ji bzhin te /
translated: Just as the defilement is.

original: 'dod pa la sogs pa las ma 'das par ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa la sogs pa las ma 'das par ro //
translated: Not having gone beyond desire, etc.

original: gus pas ni grims pa ste /üîΩspro ba'i dbang gis 'dar ba'i mtshan nyid can nam /
analyzed: gus pas ni grims pa ste / spro ba'i dbang gis 'dar ba'i mtshan nyid can nam /
translated: With devotion is with firmness.üîΩWith enthusiasm, it has the characteristic of trembling,

original: ba spu langs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi lus kyi gnas skabs so //
analyzed: ba spu langs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi lus kyi gnas skabs so //
translated: or the characteristic of the hairs of the body standing on end.

original: bsgrub pa ni mthong ba dang rjes su mthun par nan tan du byed pa ste /
analyzed: bsgrub pa ni mthong ba dang rjes su mthun par nan tan du byed pa ste /
translated: Accomplishment is the practice in accordance with the vision,

original: sdug pa la sogs pa 'dren pa dang / 'di na su su zhes smra ba dang / nga rgyal dang bcas pa ral gri la sogs pa la 'ju ba ste /
analyzed: sdug pa la sogs pa 'dren pa dang / 'di na su su zhes smra ba dang / nga rgyal dang bcas pa ral gri la sogs pa la 'ju ba ste /
translated: the leading of the beautiful, etc., the asking, ‚ÄúWho is here? ‚Äù and the grasping of the sword, etc., with pride.

original: 'di dag mthong ba'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di dag mthong ba'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of these, the vision is caused.

original: 'di snyam du gus pas bsgrub pa mthong du zin kyang /
analyzed: 'di snyam du gus pas bsgrub pa mthong du zin kyang /
translated: Even though one sees the accomplishment with devotion,

original: mngon sum bzhin du de dag gsal bar snang ba yin par ji ltar nges she na /
analyzed: mngon sum bzhin du de dag gsal bar snang ba yin par ji ltar nges she na /
translated: How do you know that they appear clearly, as if they were directly perceived?

original: lkog tu gyur pa rtogs pa ni shes pa'o //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa rtogs pa ni shes pa'o //
translated: The cognition of a hidden object is a cognition.

original: de'i 'du shes sam ni nges pa ste /
analyzed: de'i 'du shes sam ni nges pa ste /
translated: The conception or ascertainment of that is the conception of that.

original: bdag gis lkog tu gyur pa'i don shes so snyam nas nges par 'gyur ba de la ni de lta'i ste /
analyzed: bdag gis lkog tu gyur pa'i don shes so snyam nas nges par 'gyur ba de la ni de lta'i ste /
translated: The ascertainment that one has cognized a hidden object is the conception of that.

original: bya ba'i rang bzhin gus pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnam pa des 'jug pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya ba'i rang bzhin gus pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnam pa des 'jug pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not seen to engage in the form of respect, which is the nature of action.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: dper na lus ngag gi bya ba 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las gus pas bsgrub pa ni dngos su mthong ba'i rgyu can du gtan la phebs pa yin te /
analyzed: dper na lus ngag gi bya ba 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las gus pas bsgrub pa ni dngos su mthong ba'i rgyu can du gtan la phebs pa yin te /
translated: Just as the action of body and speech is preceded by desire, respect is established as the cause of direct seeing through the forward and reverse processes.

original: de mthong ba'i phyir de dag dngos su mthong bar nges pa yin par rjes su dpog pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de mthong ba'i phyir de dag dngos su mthong bar nges pa yin par rjes su dpog pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because one sees that, one infers that they are ascertained through direct seeing.

original: gang gi phyir 'dod pas brlams pa la sogs pas bslad pa las bsgoms pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyis yid kyi shes pa /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dod pas brlams pa la sogs pas bslad pa las bsgoms pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyis yid kyi shes pa /
translated: Because the mental consciousness that is preceded by meditation is contaminated by the influence of being overwhelmed by desire and so on, it is not a valid cognition.üîΩ

original: gsal bar snang ba nyid du mthong ba de'i phyir yang dag pa ste /
analyzed: gsal bar snang ba nyid du mthong ba de'i phyir yang dag pa ste /
translated: Because it is seen that the mental consciousness that is preceded by meditation is clear and appears to those who are affected by the influence of desire, etc.,

original: bden pa'am yang dag pa ma yin par yang rung ste /
analyzed: bden pa'am yang dag pa ma yin par yang rung ste /
translated: therefore, whether it is real or unreal,

original: gang kho na shin tu bsgoms pa de nyid bsgoms pa mthar phyin pa ni gsal zhing mi rtog pa'i blo'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang kho na shin tu bsgoms pa de nyid bsgoms pa mthar phyin pa ni gsal zhing mi rtog pa'i blo'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
translated: whatever is well-cultivated becomes the cause of a clear, nonconceptual mind when meditation is perfected.

original: gang zhig mi bden pa de la ni rnam par shes pa snga ma la snang ba de las tha dad pa med par shes pa phyi ma'i rgyur brjod la /
analyzed: gang zhig mi bden pa de la ni rnam par shes pa snga ma la snang ba de las tha dad pa med par shes pa phyi ma'i rgyur brjod la /
translated: That which is unreal is said to be the cause of subsequent consciousnesses, which do not differ from the appearance in the prior consciousness.

original: bden pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pas bsgom par bya ba rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis gsal ba'i rgyur gyur pa yin gyi shes pa la snang ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bden pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pas bsgom par bya ba rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis gsal ba'i rgyur gyur pa yin gyi shes pa la snang ba ni ma yin no //
translated: That which is real is the cause of the clear essential nature that is cultivated by conceptual consciousnesses, but it does not appear to consciousness.

original: bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu shes pa ni de'i 'bras bur 'gyur te snang ba de'i @119b rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu shes pa ni de'i 'bras bur 'gyur te snang ba de'i @119b rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The cognition that is the result of meditation would have that as its object, because it conforms to that appearance.

original: tshigs su bcad pas ma brjod pa'i don can bar skabs su gnas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //üîΩ'dod pa goms pas nyams pa la mi bden pa'i don gsal bar snang du chug kyang /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pas ma brjod pa'i don can bar skabs su gnas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o // 'dod pa goms pas nyams pa la mi bden pa'i don gsal bar snang du chug kyang /
translated: The verse is a verse in the middle that has a meaning not stated in the verse.üîΩEven if the object of the meditation on the unattractive appears clearly to one who has degenerated from the meditation on the unattractive,üîΩthe cognition that is the result of meditation on the unattractive would have an unreal object.

original: bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa gsal bar snang ba gang yin pa de yang mi bden pa'i don can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ji ltar zhes rang gi phyogs pa dag zer ba de bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa gsal bar snang ba gang yin pa de yang mi bden pa'i don can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ji ltar zhes rang gi phyogs pa dag zer ba de bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: To refute that, the Autocommentary explains:

original: gdon mi za bar 'di khas blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: gdon mi za bar 'di khas blang bar bya ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThis must be accepted.

original: gang gi phyir mi sdug pa zhes bya ba ni rus pa 'brel pa'i rnam pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir mi sdug pa zhes bya ba ni rus pa 'brel pa'i rnam pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The so-called unattractive is a concentration that has the aspect of connected bones.

original: zad par sa ni dngos po mtha' dag par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: zad par sa ni dngos po mtha' dag par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: The base of totality is a concentration that appears as all things.

original: sogs pa smos pa ni zad par chu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pa ni zad par chu la sogs pa'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúand so on‚Äù refers to the totality of water and so on.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yul can gang yin pa de yang ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yul can gang yin pa de yang ste /
translated: The object of that is not real.

original: yang gi sgras ni bden pa'i don 'ba' zhig gzung ba'i rnam pa gsal bar ma zad pa'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgras ni bden pa'i don 'ba' zhig gzung ba'i rnam pa gsal bar ma zad pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù in the verse makes it clear that the object is not only real.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis rnam par rtog pa med pa gsal ba snang bar ni khyod 'dod pa yin la /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis rnam par rtog pa med pa gsal ba snang bar ni khyod 'dod pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, you assert that the object of meditation is clear and nonconceptual.

original: de ltar mos pas byas pa rnal 'byor pa'i spyod yul du 'gyur ba rus pa la sogs pa rnams kyis de'i bsgrub par bya ba ni 'ga' yang mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar mos pas byas pa rnal 'byor pa'i spyod yul du 'gyur ba rus pa la sogs pa rnams kyis de'i bsgrub par bya ba ni 'ga' yang mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But if the object of meditation is a mental object created by imagination, then the yogi‚Äôs object of meditation is not accomplished by bones and so on.

original: de'i phyir 'dis ni mi bden pa'i don gsal bar snang bar mi 'dod par bzlog pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dis ni mi bden pa'i don gsal bar snang bar mi 'dod par bzlog pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this verse rejects the assertion that the object of meditation is not a clear appearance of an unreal object.

original: gal te bsgoms pa dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa gsal bar snang ba rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te bsgoms pa dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa gsal bar snang ba rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: If the object of meditation is a clear appearance in the mental consciousness, then it must be a real object, because you see it as having the nature of cause and effect.

original: bsgoms pa'i mthu las gsal bar snang ba yin du zin kyang zhes bya ba ni srid pa ste /
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i mthu las gsal bar snang ba yin du zin kyang zhes bya ba ni srid pa ste /
translated: Even if it were the case that it clearly appears due to the power of meditation,

original: rtogs pa med par ji ltar te mi 'thad pa nyid do //
analyzed: rtogs pa med par ji ltar te mi 'thad pa nyid do //
translated: it is not tenable that it is without conceptual thought.

original: 'di ltar gang zhig ji ltar goms par byas pa de nyid gzung ba gsal bar 'gyur la goms par byas pa yang sgra dang 'dres pa'i don yin pa des na de ltar gyur pa nyid du gsal ba na rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa ni rnam par rtog paüîΩcan nyid du 'thad pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ltar gang zhig ji ltar goms par byas pa de nyid gzung ba gsal bar 'gyur la goms par byas pa yang sgra dang 'dres pa'i don yin pa des na de ltar gyur pa nyid du gsal ba na rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa ni rnam par rtog pa can nyid du 'thad pa yin no zhe na /
translated: In that case, whatever is familiarized with is apprehended as clear, and familiarization is the meaning of mixing with sound. Therefore, when it is clear in that way, it is tenable that the consciousness of the yogi is conceptual.

original: gal te rnam par rtog pa gsal bar snang bar 'gyur na ni de ltar 'gyur ba na gang gi phyir sgra'i rnam pa can gyi rnam par rtog pa dang rjes su 'brel pa rjes su zhugs pa'i shes pa la don kyang de yin la gsal ba yang yin
analyzed: gal te rnam par rtog pa gsal bar snang bar 'gyur na ni de ltar 'gyur ba na gang gi phyir sgra'i rnam pa can gyi rnam par rtog pa dang rjes su 'brel pa rjes su zhugs pa'i shes pa la don kyang de yin la gsal ba yang yin
translated: If conceptual thought were to appear clearly, that would be the case. However, the object that is related to and engaged in the consciousness that has the aspect of sound is not the object that appears.

original: pa de snang ba de gang la yod pa de'i dngos po ste /
analyzed: pa de snang ba de gang la yod pa de'i dngos po ste /
translated: That which is both the object and clear

original: de yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yod pa ma yin no //
translated: does not exist.

original: de de ltar ga las she na /
analyzed: de de ltar ga las she na /
translated: How is that so?

original: gang gi phyir brjod pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir brjod pa ste /
translated: Because of the expression.

original: sgra'i rnam pa dang 'dres pa'i shes pa gang yin pa'o //üîΩde'i rang bzhin can gyi rnam par @120a * //
analyzed: sgra'i rnam pa dang 'dres pa'i shes pa gang yin pa'o // de'i rang bzhin can gyi rnam par @120a * //
translated: That is, the cognition that is mixed with the aspect of sound.üîΩAll conceptual thoughts that have that as their nature

original: rtog pa gang yin pa thams cad la don te /
analyzed: rtog pa gang yin pa thams cad la don te /
translated: have no object,

original: gzung bar bya ba gsal ba ste /
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba gsal ba ste /
translated: that is, no clear object,

original: gsal bar snang ba nyid ldog pa ste med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal bar snang ba nyid ldog pa ste med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the appearance of clarity is absent.

original: thams cad smos pa ni khyad par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad smos pa ni khyad par brjod pa yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúall‚Äù indicates a specification.

original: khyab pa de nyid bstan pa'i phyir rnam par bslad pa'i blo yang rung ste zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: khyab pa de nyid bstan pa'i phyir rnam par bslad pa'i blo yang rung ste zhes gsungs so //
translated: In order to demonstrate that pervasion, he says, ‚Äúeven a distorted cognition.‚Äù

original: yang gi sgras ni ma bslad pa'i blo yang ngo //
analyzed: yang gi sgras ni ma bslad pa'i blo yang ngo //
translated: The word ‚Äúeven‚Äù indicates that it is also a non-distorted cognition.

original: 'di skad du 'khrul pa dang ma 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni /
analyzed: 'di skad du 'khrul pa dang ma 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni /
translated: This is what is being said: all cognitions, whether distorted or non-distorted, that have conceptual thought

original: gsal bar snang ba ma yin ni zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gsal bar snang ba ma yin ni zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: do not have a clear appearance.

original: 'di nyid mjug sdud pa ni des na rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa 'di ni 'ga' zhig tu yang don gyi rnam pa gsal ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di nyid mjug sdud pa ni des na rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa 'di ni 'ga' zhig tu yang don gyi rnam pa gsal ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: This is the conclusion: Therefore, the conceptual cognition does not have the form of the object in any way.

original: de'i phyir dam bcas pa tsam gyis ni don grub pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir dam bcas pa tsam gyis ni don grub pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the object is not established by mere assertion.

original: 'o na ni rigs pa gang gi phyir rmi lam na yang dran pa'i rnam par shes pa dran pa yin no //
analyzed: 'o na ni rigs pa gang gi phyir rmi lam na yang dran pa'i rnam par shes pa dran pa yin no //
translated: But if it is a memory cognition in a dream,

original: yang gi sgras ni khyad par du'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgras ni khyad par du'o //
translated: the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù indicates a distinction.

original: rmi lam du yang ji snyed dran pa ni ji ltar de nyid du gzhan gsal bar snang ba de 'dra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rmi lam du yang ji snyed dran pa ni ji ltar de nyid du gzhan gsal bar snang ba de 'dra ba ma yin no //
translated: Even in a dream, memory is not like the appearance of another object.

original: 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: 'di ga las she na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir de 'dra ba'i don ldan min par dran te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de 'dra ba'i don ldan min par dran te /
translated: Because it is remembered as not having such an object.

original: ji ltar gsal bar snang ba gzhan bzhin du'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gsal bar snang ba gzhan bzhin du'o //
translated: It is like the appearance of another object.

original: 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa shad pa /
analyzed: 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa shad pa /
translated: This is explained in the commentary:

original: rmi lam du yang nyams su myong ba dran pa de nyid kyi rnam par can gang dag yin pa ste /
analyzed: rmi lam du yang nyams su myong ba dran pa de nyid kyi rnam par can gang dag yin pa ste /
translated: Those that have the aspect of remembering the experience in a dream,

original: de dag ni ji ltar de nyid du gzhan da ltar byung bar 'dzin pa'i rnam pa gsal bar snang ba can /
analyzed: de dag ni ji ltar de nyid du gzhan da ltar byung bar 'dzin pa'i rnam pa gsal bar snang ba can /
translated: They are just as they are apprehended as other in reality, having the appearance of the manifestation of the aspect.

original: da ltar snang ba'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa de dag ste /
analyzed: da ltar snang ba'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa de dag ste /
translated: They are just as they are, having the mode of appearance.

original: de ltar snang ba ma yin no zhes 'di nyid du bcad do //
analyzed: de ltar snang ba ma yin no zhes 'di nyid du bcad do //
translated: It is not the case that they do not appear in this way.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba bstan to //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba bstan to //
translated: Thus, this is the statement of the probandum.

original: de nas de ltar dran pa med do zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs bstan pa ste /
analyzed: de nas de ltar dran pa med do zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs bstan pa ste /
translated: Next, the statement ‚Äúthere is no memory‚Äù is the statement of the reason.

original: gang gi phyir gsal ba'i rnam pa can du ma dran pa de'i phyir gsal ba'i rnam pa can du myong ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gsal ba'i rnam pa can du ma dran pa de'i phyir gsal ba'i rnam pa can du myong ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because there is no memory of the manifold aspect, therefore there is no experience of the manifold aspect. This is the meaning.

original: dran pa med par ni rmi lam gyi gnas skabs sad pa'i dus su tha snyad du nus pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dran pa med par ni rmi lam gyi gnas skabs sad pa'i dus su tha snyad du nus pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Without memory, the state of dreaming is not possible in the waking state, because it is not possible conventionally.

original: 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin du dran pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las te /
analyzed: 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin du dran pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las te /
translated: How is this memory just as it is?

original: rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid kyi dran pa ni don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa yang srid pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid kyi dran pa ni don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa yang srid pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Memory that has the nature of conceptualization may be mistaken about the object.

original: de ni mi rigs te rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las dran pa ni nyams su myong ba'i rjes su 'brang bar nges par shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las dran pa ni nyams su myong ba'i rjes su 'brang bar nges par shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is not so, because it is known for certain that memory follows experience.

original: 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig las kyang nyams su @120b myong ba ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa yang yod mod kyi /
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig las kyang nyams su @120b myong ba ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa yang yod mod kyi /
translated: Even though there is memory that is not in accordance with experience due to some cause of error,

original: de de la ni gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma las phyin ci log gi yul can nyid du khong du chud par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: de de la ni gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma las phyin ci log gi yul can nyid du khong du chud par bya ba yin la /
translated: it is to be understood that it is mistaken with regard to its object due to a valid cognition that contradicts it.

original: gang la gnod bar byed pa med pa de la ni don ji lta ba bzhin dran pa yin no //
analyzed: gang la gnod bar byed pa med pa de la ni don ji lta ba bzhin dran pa yin no //
translated: But when there is no contradiction, memory is in accordance with the object.

original: gzhan yang gnyid sad pa'i gnas skabs kyi gsal bar nyams su myong ba'i yul gyi dran pa yang yod pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gnyid sad pa'i gnas skabs kyi gsal bar nyams su myong ba'i yul gyi dran pa yang yod pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, there is memory of an object that is experienced in the waking state.

original: gal te rmi lam gyi gnas skabs kyi dran pa'i rnam shes de gsal bar snang bar gyur na /
analyzed: gal te rmi lam gyi gnas skabs kyi dran pa'i rnam shes de gsal bar snang bar gyur na /
translated: If the memory consciousness of the dream state were to appear clearly,

original: de ci'i phyir phyin ci log tu dran par 'gyur ba bslad pa'i gnas skabs su myong ba yin pa des na mi gsal bar dran pa yin no zhes brjod par yang mi nus te /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir phyin ci log tu dran par 'gyur ba bslad pa'i gnas skabs su myong ba yin pa des na mi gsal bar dran pa yin no zhes brjod par yang mi nus te /
translated: then why would it be remembered as mistaken? It cannot be said that it is remembered as unclear because of the experience of the adulterated state.

original: gang gi phyir rmi lam gyi shes pa gsal bar snang ba dag kyang dran pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rmi lam gyi shes pa gsal bar snang ba dag kyang dran pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the dream consciousness, which appears clearly, is also remembered.

original: dus ring pos bar du chod pa de'i phyir yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dus ring pos bar du chod pa de'i phyir yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that it is not remembered because it is separated by a long period of time.

original: dran pa'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i rmi lam las mod la sad pa na sngar skyes pa'i rmi lam gyi shes pa ni gsal bar snang bar dran la /
analyzed: dran pa'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i rmi lam las mod la sad pa na sngar skyes pa'i rmi lam gyi shes pa ni gsal bar snang bar dran la /
translated: This is because when one awakens from a dream that is endowed with a memory consciousness, the dream consciousness that arose earlier is remembered as appearing clearly.

original: de ma thag tu skyes pa'i dran pa ni mi gsal bar re //
analyzed: de ma thag tu skyes pa'i dran pa ni mi gsal bar re //
translated: The memory that arises immediately after that is not clear.

original: de'i phyir gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma dang ldan pa'i 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan med pas na /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma dang ldan pa'i 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan med pas na /
translated: Therefore, because there is no cause for error that is endowed with a valid cognition that contradicts it,

original: gang zhig ji lta bu'i don gyi rnam pa nyams su myong bar dran pa de ni de lta bu'i don myong ba sngon du 'gro ba can yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig ji lta bu'i don gyi rnam pa nyams su myong bar dran pa de ni de lta bu'i don myong ba sngon du 'gro ba can yin te /
translated: That memory which experiences the aspect of an object in a certain way is preceded by the experience of that object in that way.

original: dper na mngon par 'dod pa sad pa'i gnas skabs kyi nyams su myong ba 'ga' zhig gi dran pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mngon par 'dod pa sad pa'i gnas skabs kyi nyams su myong ba 'ga' zhig gi dran pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, memory of some experience in the waking state when one desires it.

original: de bzhin du rmi lam gyi dran pa'i shes pa la dmigs pas kyang mi gsal bar dran pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rmi lam gyi dran pa'i shes pa la dmigs pas kyang mi gsal bar dran pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, the consciousness that is the memory of a dream is a memory that is not clear because it is based on a dream.

original: phyi rol gyi don gyi tshul la shes pa thams cad kyi phyin ci log pa nyid ni /üîΩgnod par byed pa'i tshad mas nye bar bsgrubs pa'i mi slu ba ma yin pa nyid kyis khyab pa yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don gyi tshul la shes pa thams cad kyi phyin ci log pa nyid ni / gnod par byed pa'i tshad mas nye bar bsgrubs pa'i mi slu ba ma yin pa nyid kyis khyab pa yin te /
translated: In the system of external objects, all consciousnesses are mistakenüîΩbecause they are not nondeceptive due to being undermined by valid knowledge.

original: bar ti ka las gnod par byed pa'i rigs pa dam pa med na zhes bya ba dang / rnam par nges pa las kyang gnod par byed pa med pa'i phyir 'khrul par mi 'grub bo zhes bshad do //
analyzed: bar ti ka las gnod par byed pa'i rigs pa dam pa med na zhes bya ba dang / rnam par nges pa las kyang gnod par byed pa med pa'i phyir 'khrul par mi 'grub bo zhes bshad do //
translated: In the Vadanyaya it says, ‚ÄúIf there is no valid reason to undermine it,‚Äù and in the Vada-nanyagatika it says, ‚ÄúBecause there is no undermining, it is not established as mistaken.‚Äù

original: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa 'ga' zhig don yod par mthong ba'i phyir dang / zhen par bya ba'i don la ltos nas mi slu ba'i rgyu yang don yod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir mi slu ba ni don yod pa nyid kyis khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa 'ga' zhig don yod par mthong ba'i phyir dang / zhen par bya ba'i don la ltos nas mi slu ba'i rgyu yang don yod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir mi slu ba ni don yod pa nyid kyis khyab pa yin no //
translated: because some direct perception and inference are seen to have existent objects, and because the cause of nondeception is the existence of the object in relation to the object to be grasped, nondeception is pervaded by the existence of the object.

original: gnod par byed pa yod na ni mi slu ba med pa'i phyir gnod par byed pa med pa nyid ni mi slu ba kho nar nges par bya ba yin la /üîΩdran @121a * //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa yod na ni mi slu ba med pa'i phyir gnod par byed pa med pa nyid ni mi slu ba kho nar nges par bya ba yin la / dran @121a * //
translated: And when there is a sublating cognition, there is no nondeception, so the absence of a sublating cognition is ascertained to be nondeception alone.

original: pa las yang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma med pas mi slu ba yin no //
analyzed: pa las yang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma med pas mi slu ba yin no //
translated: And from memory, there is no sublating valid cognition, so it is nondeceptive.

original: nyams su myong ba'i 'bras bu nyid du ni mthong ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i 'bras bu nyid du ni mthong ba'i phyir te /
translated: And because the result of experience is seen.

original: phyin ci log gi don can nyid yin na ni rjes su 'brel bar dran bar mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: phyin ci log gi don can nyid yin na ni rjes su 'brel bar dran bar mi 'gyur na /
translated: If it had a meaning that was erroneous, then it would not be remembered in a related way.

original: rmi lam gyi dran pa ni thams cad kyang mi gsal bar snang bar dran no //
analyzed: rmi lam gyi dran pa ni thams cad kyang mi gsal bar snang bar dran no //
translated: But the memory of a dream is remembered as unclear in all respects.

original: rjes su 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni rmi lam gyi dran ba thams cad la khyab par yod par dran pa yin la /
analyzed: rjes su 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni rmi lam gyi dran ba thams cad la khyab par yod par dran pa yin la /
translated: The so-called ‚Äúconnection‚Äù is the memory that pervades all memories of dreams.

original: 'di 'dra ba'i dran pa ni nyams su myong ba'i 'bras bur grub bo //
analyzed: 'di 'dra ba'i dran pa ni nyams su myong ba'i 'bras bur grub bo //
translated: Such a memory is established as the effect of experience.

original: des na 'di las gnod par byed pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des na 'di las gnod par byed pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, there is no harm to this argument.

original: du ba me'i 'bras bu yin pa la ni gnod par byed ba med pa bzhin no //
analyzed: du ba me'i 'bras bu yin pa la ni gnod par byed ba med pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the case of smoke being the effect of fire, where there is no harm to that.

original: de'i phyir de ltar khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pas rmi lam gyi dran pa dran pa la phyin ci log nyid bkag ba'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pas rmi lam gyi dran pa dran pa la phyin ci log nyid bkag ba'am /
translated: Thus, by the non-apprehension of the pervasion, the memory of dream memory is refuted as mistaken,

original: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis ji ltar zhen pa bzhin du mi gsal bar snang ba'i dran pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid yin pa des na rmi lam gyi dran pa mi gsal bar snang ba yin no zhes gnas so //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis ji ltar zhen pa bzhin du mi gsal bar snang ba'i dran pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid yin pa des na rmi lam gyi dran pa mi gsal bar snang ba yin no zhes gnas so //
translated: or by a reason of nature, it is established that memory must have as its antecedent the appearance of the object as it is conceived, and therefore the memory of dream memory is the appearance of the object as it is conceived.

original: de lta na yang ji ltar rnam par rtog pa gsal bar snang bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na yang ji ltar rnam par rtog pa gsal bar snang bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Even so, why don‚Äôt the appearances of conceptual thoughts become clear?

original: smras pa / 'di la dbang po'i rnam par shes pa ni rang gi nye bar len pa las skyes pa na dbang po las gsal bar snang ba yin te /
analyzed: smras pa / 'di la dbang po'i rnam par shes pa ni rang gi nye bar len pa las skyes pa na dbang po las gsal bar snang ba yin te /
translated: Objection: In this regard, the sense consciousnesses, when they arise from their own appropriator, appear clearly from the sense faculty.

original: dbang po las skyes pa 'khrul pa rnams kyang gsal bar snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po las skyes pa 'khrul pa rnams kyang gsal bar snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even those that arise from the sense faculty and are mistaken appear clearly.

original: yid kyi mngon sum ni don las so //
analyzed: yid kyi mngon sum ni don las so //
translated: Mental direct perception arises from the object.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa gsal bar snang ba ma yin pa gsal bar snang bar byed par nus pa nyid ces bya ba'i rnam par bslad pa yin na rnam par rtog pa ni gsal bar byed nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa gsal bar snang ba ma yin pa gsal bar snang bar byed par nus pa nyid ces bya ba'i rnam par bslad pa yin na rnam par rtog pa ni gsal bar byed nus pa ma yin te /
translated: If mental consciousness is not clear, it is not able to make something clear. This is the nature of mistaken consciousness. But conceptual consciousness is not able to make something clear.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis der sgra'i rnam pa dang 'brel pa las gzhan gnyid kyis gsal bar snang bar byed pa'i nus pa'i gegs byed pa'i rgyu ni ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis der sgra'i rnam pa dang 'brel pa las gzhan gnyid kyis gsal bar snang bar byed pa'i nus pa'i gegs byed pa'i rgyu ni ma mthong ngo //
translated: Because we do not see a cause that obstructs the ability of mental consciousness to make something clear, other than the connection with the aspect of sound through the process of positive and negative concomitance.

original: de'i phyir sgra'i rnam pa dang 'brel pa nyid ni gsal bar snang ba dang 'gal bar khong du chud do //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra'i rnam pa dang 'brel pa nyid ni gsal bar snang ba dang 'gal bar khong du chud do //
translated: Therefore we understand that the connection with the aspect of sound itself is incompatible with clear appearance.

original: de ni de kho na ltar yin te /
analyzed: de ni de kho na ltar yin te /
translated: That is exactly how it is.

original: gang gi phyir rmi lam dang sad pa'i sgra dang 'dres par 'dzin pa ni gnyid kyis brlams pa la sogs pa'i rgyu can ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rmi lam dang sad pa'i sgra dang 'dres par 'dzin pa ni gnyid kyis brlams pa la sogs pa'i rgyu can ma yin gyi /
translated: For the apprehension of the sound of the dream and the sound of the waking state as mixed is not due to the cause of being overcome by sleep, and so on.

original: 'on kyang ldog pa dang rjes su 'gro ba dag las brda'i rgyu can nyid yin par mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'on kyang ldog pa dang rjes su 'gro ba dag las brda'i rgyu can nyid yin par mthong ngo //
translated: But rather, it is seen to be due to the cause of the convention of the reverse and the forward.

original: de'i phyir brda'i dus su mthong ba'i dngos po yul can yin pa'i phyir sngar mthong ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin sdom pa'i rgyu can yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir brda'i dus su mthong ba'i dngos po yul can yin pa'i phyir sngar mthong ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin sdom pa'i rgyu can yin la /
translated: Therefore, because the object of the cognition is the entity that is seen at the time of the convention, it is due to the cause of the recollection of the nature of the object that was seen previously.

original: sngon mthong @121b pa'i yul nyid du 'dzin pas don nye ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba na yang gsal bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngon mthong @121b pa'i yul nyid du 'dzin pas don nye ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba na yang gsal bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And because it apprehends the object that was seen previously, it is not clear when the object appears to have a nature that is not present.

original: gang gi phyir nye ba nyid du snang na ni gsal bar snang bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir nye ba nyid du snang na ni gsal bar snang bar 'gyur na /
translated: If it were clear when it appeared to be present,

original: sngon zhugs ba'i mthong ba'i yul nyid kyis sngon byung ba'i dngos por gzung ba ni nye ba'i rang bzhin du snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: sngon zhugs ba'i mthong ba'i yul nyid kyis sngon byung ba'i dngos por gzung ba ni nye ba'i rang bzhin du snang ba ma yin te /
translated: then the apprehension of the entity that occurred previously due to the object that was seen previously would not appear to have a nature that is present.

original: des na gsal bar snang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na gsal bar snang ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not clearly manifest.

original: rab rib can gyis mthong ba ni nye ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du mi snang ba de'i phyir sgra'i tshogs gsal bar snang ba yin no //
analyzed: rab rib can gyis mthong ba ni nye ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du mi snang ba de'i phyir sgra'i tshogs gsal bar snang ba yin no //
translated: What is seen by one with an eye disease does not appear as the nature of something nearby. Therefore, the collection of sounds is clearly manifest.

original: de lta bur gyur pa yang res 'ga' gsal bar snang ba'i rgyu 'ga' zhig gis gsal bar byed /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa yang res 'ga' gsal bar snang ba'i rgyu 'ga' zhig gis gsal bar byed /
translated: And that which is like that is sometimes made clear by some cause of clear manifestation.

original: srid pa rnam par rtog pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa gsal bar snang ba'i rgyu khyad par can don rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed nus pa gnyid ces bya ba'i rnam par bslad pa des kyang gsal bar snang bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: srid pa rnam par rtog pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa gsal bar snang ba'i rgyu khyad par can don rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed nus pa gnyid ces bya ba'i rnam par bslad pa des kyang gsal bar snang bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The cause of the clear manifestation of the mental consciousness is the special conception of existence, which is the ability to reveal various aspects of objects. Sleep, which is a type of mental disturbance, does not make it clearly manifest.

original: de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa gsal bar snang ba'i rgyu gang gis kyang gsal bar snang bar byed mi nus so //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa gsal bar snang ba'i rgyu gang gis kyang gsal bar snang bar byed mi nus so //
translated: Therefore, no cause of the clear manifestation of the mental consciousness can make conception clearly manifest.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bslad pa'am gzhan gyis kyang rnam par rtog pa ni gsal bar byed pa ma yin gyi zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bslad pa'am gzhan gyis kyang rnam par rtog pa ni gsal bar byed pa ma yin gyi zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said that ‚Äúa conceptual cognition is not clarified by another, or by itself.‚Äù

original: gang zhig brda'i dus su mthong ba nyid kyis dngos po la reg pa can gyi shes pa de ni gang gis kyang gsal bar bya bar nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig brda'i dus su mthong ba nyid kyis dngos po la reg pa can gyi shes pa de ni gang gis kyang gsal bar bya bar nus pa ma yin te /
translated: A cognition that, at the time of the convention, touches the thing itself, cannot be clarified by anything else,

original: dper na mthong ba 'gags nas yun ring du lon pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mthong ba 'gags nas yun ring du lon pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzhin no //
translated: just like a conceptual cognition that has long ceased after seeing something.

original: rmi lam gyi rnam par rtog pa yang brda'i dus su mthong ba nyid kyis dngos po las reg par byed pa can yin no //
analyzed: rmi lam gyi rnam par rtog pa yang brda'i dus su mthong ba nyid kyis dngos po las reg par byed pa can yin no //
translated: A conceptual cognition in a dream also touches the thing itself, by seeing it at the time of the convention.

original: gsal bar snang ba nyid ni nye ba'i rang bzhin du snang ba yin la /
analyzed: gsal bar snang ba nyid ni nye ba'i rang bzhin du snang ba yin la /
translated: The appearance of clarity is the appearance of a proximate nature.

original: sngon mthong ba nyid du 'dzin pa la ni nye ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos por snang bas khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon mthong ba nyid du 'dzin pa la ni nye ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos por snang bas khyab pa yin no //
translated: The apprehension of something as seen before is pervaded by the appearance of a thing with a non-proximate nature.

original: sngon gyi shes pa'i yul gyi dngos po nyid ni sngon gyi shes pa log pa'i tshe na yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sngon gyi shes pa'i yul gyi dngos po nyid ni sngon gyi shes pa log pa'i tshe na yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The object of the prior consciousness does not exist when the prior consciousness has ceased.

original: de'i phyir phyis 'byung ba'i shes pas sngon gyi shes pa'i yul nye ba ma yin pa nyid kyis dngos po la reg pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir phyis 'byung ba'i shes pas sngon gyi shes pa'i yul nye ba ma yin pa nyid kyis dngos po la reg pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, the later consciousness does not contact the object because it does not contact the object of the prior consciousness.

original: brda'i dus su mthong ba'i sgras khyad par du 'dzin pa yang sngon gyi shes pa'i yul 'dzin pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: brda'i dus su mthong ba'i sgras khyad par du 'dzin pa yang sngon gyi shes pa'i yul 'dzin pa nyid yin te /
translated: Also, the apprehension of the object of the prior consciousness is the apprehension of the object of the prior consciousness qualified by the word seen at the time of the convention.

original: des na 'di ni 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'o //üîΩgal te 'o na gsal bar snang ba dang 'gal bas khyab pa nyid kyis sngon mthong ba 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa gang gis kyang gsal bar snang ba can du byed mi @122a * //
analyzed: des na 'di ni 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'o // gal te 'o na gsal bar snang ba dang 'gal bas khyab pa nyid kyis sngon mthong ba 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa gang gis kyang gsal bar snang ba can du byed mi @122a * //
translated: Therefore, this is the observation of a pervasion by contradiction.üîΩIf the object of the prior consciousness is not clear because it is pervaded by contradiction with clear appearance, then it is impossible for any conception that has the characteristic of apprehending the prior object to make it have clear appearance.

original: nus na 'o na ni nye ba ma yin pa sngon mthong ba 'dzin pa'i phyir na gsal bar snang ba ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid gtan tshigs su brjod par bya ba las /
analyzed: nus na 'o na ni nye ba ma yin pa sngon mthong ba 'dzin pa'i phyir na gsal bar snang ba ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid gtan tshigs su brjod par bya ba las /
translated: If that is so, then the reason that the object of the prior consciousness is not clear because it does not contact the object of the prior consciousness should be stated.

original: ci'i phyir rmi lam gyis kyang gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa gsal bar bya nus pa ma yin no zhes brjod ce na ;üîΩbden te / 'on kyang kha cig 'di snyam du ji ltar yid kyi rnam shes gsal bar snang ba ma yin pa bsgoms pas gsal bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par rtog pa yang yin no zhes dogs par 'gyur ba de bzlog pa'i don du yid kyi rnam par shes
analyzed: ci'i phyir rmi lam gyis kyang gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa gsal bar bya nus pa ma yin no zhes brjod ce na ; bden te / 'on kyang kha cig 'di snyam du ji ltar yid kyi rnam shes gsal bar snang ba ma yin pa bsgoms pas gsal bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par rtog pa yang yin no zhes dogs par 'gyur ba de bzlog pa'i don du yid kyi rnam par shes
translated: Why is it not clear even in dreams?

original: pa gsal bar snang ba'i rgyu ni rnam par rtog pa gsal bar snang bar bya ba la mthu rdugs par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: pa gsal bar snang ba'i rgyu ni rnam par rtog pa gsal bar snang bar bya ba la mthu rdugs par bstan pa yin no //
translated: It is true that it is not clear, but in order to eliminate the doubt of someone who thinks, ‚ÄúJust as mental consciousness is not clear but becomes clear through meditation, so too is conception,‚Äù the cause of the clear appearance of mental consciousness is taught to be incapable of making conception clear.

original: de'i don 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don 'di yin te /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: yid kyi rnam shes gsal bar snang ba'i rgyu yin no zhes te /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam shes gsal bar snang ba'i rgyu yin no zhes te /
translated: The cause of the clear appearance of mental consciousness is the cause of the clear appearance of conception.

original: de ltar rnam par rtog pa yang gsal bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par rtog pa yang gsal bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus conception is not clear,

original: sgra dang 'dres pa la gsal bar snang ba nyid 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra dang 'dres pa la gsal bar snang ba nyid 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is contradictory that it is clear when mixed with sound.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gnyid kyis kyang gsal bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gnyid kyis kyang gsal bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, sleep does not clarify it either,

original: 'gal ba nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the presence of an opposing factor.

original: bsgom par bya ba'i don ni gsal bar snang bar 'gyur ba yin na sgra ni bsgom par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgom par bya ba'i don ni gsal bar snang bar 'gyur ba yin na sgra ni bsgom par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: The object of meditation appears clearly, but sound is not an object of meditation.

original: sgra dang don bsgom par bya ba yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: sgra dang don bsgom par bya ba yin du zin kyang /
translated: Even if sound and meaning were objects of meditation,

original: ji srid sngar mthong ba nyid du snang ba de srid du rnam par rtog pa can gyi shes pa yin zhing de srid du yang de dag gsal bar snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ji srid sngar mthong ba nyid du snang ba de srid du rnam par rtog pa can gyi shes pa yin zhing de srid du yang de dag gsal bar snang ba ma yin te /
translated: as long as they appear as if seen before, they are conceptual cognitions, and as long as that is so, they do not appear clearly,

original: nye ba ma yin pa nyid du snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye ba ma yin pa nyid du snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they appear as if not present.

original: yang gang gi tshe sngar mthong ba nyid du mi 'dzin pa de'i tshe yang phan tshun gtso bo dang phal pa'i dngos por snang ba med pa ni 'brel par snang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: yang gang gi tshe sngar mthong ba nyid du mi 'dzin pa de'i tshe yang phan tshun gtso bo dang phal pa'i dngos por snang ba med pa ni 'brel par snang ba ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, when one does not apprehend them as seen before, then even though they appear as if principal and secondary, they do not appear as related, because they appear as if not present.

original: phal pa dang gtso bo'i dngos po dang bral bas 'brel pas stong par 'dzin par byed pa ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phal pa dang gtso bo'i dngos po dang bral bas 'brel pas stong par 'dzin par byed pa ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa ma yin te /
translated: The apprehension of emptiness as devoid of the thing that is the primary and secondary factors is not a conceptual consciousness.

original: dper na bum pa gnyis 'dzin par byed pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bum pa gnyis 'dzin par byed pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the apprehension of two pots is not conceptual.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa sgra la sogs pa'i spyod yul du mi 'dzin par byed pa yin yang /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa sgra la sogs pa'i spyod yul du mi 'dzin par byed pa yin yang /
translated: Therefore, although the consciousness of a yogi does not apprehend sound, etc.,

original: khyad par can gyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid phal pa dang gtso bor 'dzin ba med pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa can yin no zhes lan mang du bshad zin to //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid phal pa dang gtso bor 'dzin ba med pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa can yin no zhes lan mang du bshad zin to //
translated: because it does not apprehend the primary and secondary characteristics of a special thing, it is conceptual. This has been explained many times.

original: de ltar gnas pa na skabs kyi don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de ltar gnas pa na skabs kyi don ni 'di yin te /
translated: Thus, the meaning of the passage is as follows.

original: khyad par can gyi don can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang zhig bsgoms pas khyad par du 'gyur bar srid pa de ni gsal bar snang bar 'gyur @122b ba yin te /
analyzed: khyad par can gyi don can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang zhig bsgoms pas khyad par du 'gyur bar srid pa de ni gsal bar snang bar 'gyur @122b ba yin te /
translated: That mental consciousness which has a special object and which becomes special through meditation, that consciousness appears clearly.

original: dper na 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i dngos bo'i khyad par du snang ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i dngos bo'i khyad par du snang ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the mental consciousness to which the particular thing, such as fear, appears.

original: bsgoms pas khyad par du 'gyur ba la ni gsal bar snang bar byed nus pas khyab pa yin la /
analyzed: bsgoms pas khyad par du 'gyur ba la ni gsal bar snang bar byed nus pas khyab pa yin la /
translated: In the case of a special quality produced by meditation, it is pervaded by the ability to make it appear clearly.üîΩIf, even though it exists, it cannot appear clearly, then the power of meditation is lost, and therefore it would never appear clearly.

original: gal te de yod du zin kyang gsal bar snang bar mi 'gyur na ni bsgoms ba'i nus pa nyid spangs par 'gyur ba yin pas de'i phyir lan cig kyang gsal bar mi 'gyur ba las 'jigs ba la sogs pa la mthong ba yang yin no //
analyzed: gal te de yod du zin kyang gsal bar snang bar mi 'gyur na ni bsgoms ba'i nus pa nyid spangs par 'gyur ba yin pas de'i phyir lan cig kyang gsal bar mi 'gyur ba las 'jigs ba la sogs pa la mthong ba yang yin no //
translated: But it is seen that fear, etc., do appear.

original: gang gis nus pa med pa nyid du dogs par 'gyur ba de la rgyu gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis nus pa med pa nyid du dogs par 'gyur ba de la rgyu gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And there is no other cause for the doubt that it is powerless.

original: des na khyab par byed ba mi dmigs bas mi mthun ba'i phyogs las ldog pa na gtan tshigs rang bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: des na khyab par byed ba mi dmigs bas mi mthun ba'i phyogs las ldog pa na gtan tshigs rang bzhin nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the reason is the nature of the thing itself, when the opposite of the similar instance is excluded by the non-apprehension of the pervasion.

original: bdag cag la sogs pa'i mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yang bsgoms pa khyad par du 'gro ba srid pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag cag la sogs pa'i mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yang bsgoms pa khyad par du 'gro ba srid pa yin no //
translated: It is possible that the mental consciousness of ourselves and others, having the aspect of impermanence, etc., will progress to the point of being cultivated.

original: gtan tshigs ma grub pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma grub pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is the reason unestablished.

original: 'di ltar ra zhig mi rtag ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes pa dngos po thams cad kyi yul can ni srid pa nyid yin par kho bo cag la sogs pa'i nyams su myong bas grub pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar ra zhig mi rtag ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes pa dngos po thams cad kyi yul can ni srid pa nyid yin par kho bo cag la sogs pa'i nyams su myong bas grub pa yin la /
translated: Thus, the consciousness having the aspect of impermanence, etc., and having all things as its object, is possible, and is established by the experience of ourselves and others.

original: de sgom par byed pa na rgyun gyis bsgrub par nus pa nyid kyang nyams su myong bas khong du chud pa yin no //
analyzed: de sgom par byed pa na rgyun gyis bsgrub par nus pa nyid kyang nyams su myong bas khong du chud pa yin no //
translated: And when it is cultivated, it is possible to accomplish it by means of a continuum, and that is understood by experience.

original: bsgoms pa'i rgyu snying rje yang 'ga' zhig la srid pa la /
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i rgyu snying rje yang 'ga' zhig la srid pa la /
translated: Compassion, which is the cause of cultivation, is possible for some.

original: 'jig rten pha rol yang gzhan du bsgrubs pa de'i phyir bsgoms pa'i dus kyang yod pas mi srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol yang gzhan du bsgrubs pa de'i phyir bsgoms pa'i dus kyang yod pas mi srid pa ma yin no //
translated: And since the existence of another world is established elsewhere, cultivation is not impossible.

original: de'i phyir de ltar phul du phyin pa'i dus su goms par byas pa dang lhan cig pa'i rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa gsal bar snang ba skye ba'i rgyu ma tshang ba med pa'i yin par bstan pa yin te ;
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar phul du phyin pa'i dus su goms par byas pa dang lhan cig pa'i rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa gsal bar snang ba skye ba'i rgyu ma tshang ba med pa'i yin par bstan pa yin te ;
translated: Therefore, at the time of the culmination of the process, the consciousness that is concomitant with the object of meditation is the consciousness that is the complete cause of the clear appearance of mental consciousness.

original: rgyu mtshan ba med pa bstan pa nyid 'ga' zhig gi srid pa'i tshad mar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan ba med pa bstan pa nyid 'ga' zhig gi srid pa'i tshad mar brjod pa yin no //
translated: This is the meaning of the statement that there is no reason to teach it.

original: 'di ltar rgyu'i tshogs pa 'di yod la gegs byed pa med na ni nges par 'bras bu de 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di srid pa'i don yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar rgyu'i tshogs pa 'di yod la gegs byed pa med na ni nges par 'bras bu de 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di srid pa'i don yin gyi /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúpossible‚Äù is as follows: If this collection of causes exists and there is no obstruction, then the effect will definitely arise.üîΩThe meaning of ‚Äúpossible‚Äù is this.

original: de 'gog pa'i gtan tshigs med pa de'i phyir srid par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni srid pa'i don ma yin te /
analyzed: de 'gog pa'i gtan tshigs med pa de'i phyir srid par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni srid pa'i don ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúpossible‚Äù is not the statement, ‚ÄúBecause there is no reason to refute it, it is possible.‚Äù

original: rgyu rnams tshogs bas 'bras bu skye bar rjes su dpog pa ni srid pa'i tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu rnams tshogs bas 'bras bu skye bar rjes su dpog pa ni srid pa'i tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúpossible‚Äù is that it is possible to infer that the effect arises from the collection of causes.

original: ji ltar 'di rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi khongs su 'du ba de ltar ni rgyu tshogs pa las 'bras bu skye ba zhes 'di nyid du ston par 'gyur ro //üîΩde lta na yang kha cig na re yid @123a * //
analyzed: ji ltar 'di rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi khongs su 'du ba de ltar ni rgyu tshogs pa las 'bras bu skye ba zhes 'di nyid du ston par 'gyur ro // de lta na yang kha cig na re yid @123a * //
translated: Just as this is included in the category of natural reasoning, so it will be shown in this very text that effects arise from the assembly of causes.

original: kyi rnam par shes pa ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pas de ji ltar dag par byed nus shing gang gis na mngon sum du 'gyur zhes gang smras pa de la yang gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: kyi rnam par shes pa ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pas de ji ltar dag par byed nus shing gang gis na mngon sum du 'gyur zhes gang smras pa de la yang gsal ba yin te /
translated: Even so, some say, ‚ÄúSince mental consciousness is itself the nature of ignorance, how can it be purified and by what means does it become manifest?‚Äù

original: bsgoms bas gsal bar snang ba nyid yin pa de'i phyir rnam par rtog ba med pa yin la /
analyzed: bsgoms bas gsal bar snang ba nyid yin pa de'i phyir rnam par rtog ba med pa yin la /
translated: This is clarified, because it is the appearance of clarity through meditation, and therefore it is nonconceptual.

original: tshad mas yongs su dpag pa'i don can nyid kyis kyang mi slu ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: tshad mas yongs su dpag pa'i don can nyid kyis kyang mi slu ba nyid yin te /
translated: And because it has the meaning of being fully ascertained by valid knowledge, it is also nondeceptive.

original: de'i phyir bsgoms pas mngon sum nyid du 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i ji ltar ma rig pa'i rang bzhin don med pa 'dzin par 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgoms pas mngon sum nyid du 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i ji ltar ma rig pa'i rang bzhin don med pa 'dzin par 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, how could that which becomes manifest through meditation be the meaningless apprehension of the nature of ignorance?

original: gzhan yang rnam par shes pa ni don 'dzin par nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnam par shes pa ni don 'dzin par nges pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, consciousness is not necessarily the apprehender of objects,

original: don med pa yang 'dzin pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: don med pa yang 'dzin pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: because it apprehends what is nonexistent.

original: / don med par 'dzin par nges pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: / don med par 'dzin par nges pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it necessarily the apprehender of what is nonexistent,

original: dbang po'i rnam par shes pas don yang 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po'i rnam par shes pas don yang 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the sense consciousnesses apprehend objects.

original: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa bdag nyid du ma gyur ba gsal bar byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir yod pa dang med pa khyad par med par gsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa bdag nyid du ma gyur ba gsal bar byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir yod pa dang med pa khyad par med par gsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since consciousness is endowed with the power to manifest what is not itself, it manifests what is existent and what is nonexistent without distinction.üîΩSince it is the apprehender of objects that possess the distinction of aspect, existence is apprehended by nature,

original: rnam pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i shes bya 'dzin par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir yod pa ni ngo bo nyid las 'dzin pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i shes bya 'dzin par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir yod pa ni ngo bo nyid las 'dzin pa yin te /
translated: because the existent object that possesses the distinction of aspect is apprehended by consciousness.

original: gang gi phyir gzung bar bya ba'i rang bzhin de dang 'dzin par byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes pa yod pas de ci'i phyir mi 'dzin /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzung bar bya ba'i rang bzhin de dang 'dzin par byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes pa yod pas de ci'i phyir mi 'dzin /
translated: Since the nature of the object to be apprehended and the consciousness that apprehends it exist, why would it not apprehend it?

original: 'dzin par byed pa yod cing dngos po yang yod pa na yod pa'i don mi 'dzin pa ni rgyu las nges pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa yod cing dngos po yang yod pa na yod pa'i don mi 'dzin pa ni rgyu las nges pa'i phyir te /
translated: If there is an apprehender and there is an object, then the apprehension of an existent object is ascertained from the cause.

original: dper na gsal ba'i bdag nyid du yod pa'i sgron ma ni rgyu'i stobs kyis nye ba na 'dug ba nyid gsal bar byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gsal ba'i bdag nyid du yod pa'i sgron ma ni rgyu'i stobs kyis nye ba na 'dug ba nyid gsal bar byed pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, a lamp that exists in the form of illumination illuminates what is nearby by the power of the cause.

original: de'i phyir rang bzhin dang bcas pa'i dngos po 'dzin pa ni rang gi ngo bo kho na las yin pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin par grub bo //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang bzhin dang bcas pa'i dngos po 'dzin pa ni rang gi ngo bo kho na las yin pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin par grub bo //
translated: Therefore, the apprehension of an object that possesses a nature is from its own nature alone. Thus, the nature of consciousness that possesses a nature is established.

original: med pa ni rnam pa dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: med pa ni rnam pa dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa ma yin no //
translated: That which does not exist is empty of the nature that possesses an aspect, and therefore it does not apprehend its own nature.

original: rgyu mtshan gzhan gyis kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gzhan gyis kyang ma yin te /
translated: It is not by another reason,

original: rgyu mtshan gzhan ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gzhan ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because another reason is not seen.

original: 'on kyang nyams su myong ba'i dngos po dang 'dra ba'i me tog don gyi rnam pa ni log par 'dzin pa goms pa las rnam par shes pas bdag nyid la ston par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang nyams su myong ba'i dngos po dang 'dra ba'i me tog don gyi rnam pa ni log par 'dzin pa goms pa las rnam par shes pas bdag nyid la ston par byed pa yin no //
translated: But the form of the object, which is like the experienced thing, is shown to the consciousness by the habit-energy of the grasping of the unreal.

original: gang gi phyir de sngon du 'gro ba can gyi med pa'i don 'dzin pa'i thog ma dang bcas par 'gyur ba don nyams su myong ba dang log par 'dzin pa'i bag chags la thog ma yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de sngon du 'gro ba can gyi med pa'i don 'dzin pa'i thog ma dang bcas par 'gyur ba don nyams su myong ba dang log par 'dzin pa'i bag chags la thog ma yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Because it would have a beginning, the grasping of the unreal would have a beginning, and the habit-energy of the grasping of the unreal would have a beginning, but the experience of the object does not have a beginning.

original: de'i phyir don 'dzin pa la @123b ltos pa'i log par 'dzin pa goms pa ni rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir don 'dzin pa la @123b ltos pa'i log par 'dzin pa goms pa ni rgyu yin no //
translated: Therefore, the habit-energy of the grasping of the unreal, which is dependent on the grasping of the object, is the cause.

original: de kho na nyid nges par rtogs pa na ldog pa'i chos can yin pa nyid kyis rang gi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i don med pa 'dzin pa ni rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de kho na nyid nges par rtogs pa na ldog pa'i chos can yin pa nyid kyis rang gi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i don med pa 'dzin pa ni rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin te /
translated: When one realizes reality, the grasping of the unreal, which is dependent on the grasping of the object, is stopped, because it is a phenomenon that ceases. The grasping of the unreal is not the nature of consciousness, because it grasps an unreal object that is not its own nature.

original: de'i phyir ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni glo bur ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni glo bur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, ignorance is adventitious.

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa ni rang gi dngos po tsam la ltos pa dang / dngos po rnams kyi da kho na'i rang bzhin yang ldog pa med pas mi ldog pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i rang gi rang bzhin yin na /
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa ni rang gi dngos po tsam la ltos pa dang / dngos po rnams kyi da kho na'i rang bzhin yang ldog pa med pas mi ldog pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i rang gi rang bzhin yin na /
translated: The nature of things is to apprehend their own nature, and the nature of things is not to be reversed, because the nature of things is not to be reversed.

original: de ji ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa don med par 'dzin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ji ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa don med par 'dzin par 'gyur te /
