translated: When the object is cognized, one engages in it, and by that, one attains the object. Therefore, the activity of cognizing the object is the activity of attaining the object. Thus, the result of valid cognition, which must be attained, is just that, and nothing else.

original: gzhan gyis smras ba ni byed pa po'i ngo bor gyur pa'i dngos po la ni tshad mang brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhan gyis smras ba ni byed pa po'i ngo bor gyur pa'i dngos po la ni tshad mang brjod pa yin la /
translated: Others say that the valid cognition is expressed in relation to the entity that is the nature of the agent.

original: byed pa yang bya ba'i sgrub par byed pa dam pa yin te /
analyzed: byed pa yang bya ba'i sgrub par byed pa dam pa yin te /
translated: And the activity is the supreme means of establishing the action.

original: de'i phyir gang la ltos nas de de'i byed par 'gyur ba 'bras bur gyur pa'i bya ba 'ga' zhig gdon mi za bar yod dgos so zhes bya ba yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang la ltos nas de de'i byed par 'gyur ba 'bras bur gyur pa'i bya ba 'ga' zhig gdon mi za bar yod dgos so zhes bya ba yin la /
translated: Therefore, in dependence on which, that is its effect, it is its activity.

original: cig shos kyis kyang 'jal ba'i bya ba byed pa tshad ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: cig shos kyis kyang 'jal ba'i bya ba byed pa tshad ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: And the other, the activity of measuring, is valid knowledge.üîΩTherefore, that is the effect. And the effect of valid knowledge is the ascertainment of the object.

original: de nyid 'bras bu yin la tshad ma'i 'bras bu de yang las nges par gcod pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gzhal bya rtogs pa'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid 'bras bu yin la tshad ma'i 'bras bu de yang las nges par gcod pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gzhal bya rtogs pa'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: In order to demonstrate this, it says, ‚Äúthe realization of the object.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir gzhal bya rtogs pa de ni shes pa yin la de yang 'bras bu yin pa des na shes pa nyid 'bras bur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhal bya rtogs pa de ni shes pa yin la de yang 'bras bu yin pa des na shes pa nyid 'bras bur 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the realization of the object is consciousness, and that is the effect, consciousness itself is the effect.

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir da ni ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir da ni ste /
translated: Because that is so, now,

original: da ltar shes pa 'bras bu'i dngos por khas blangs na /
analyzed: da ltar shes pa 'bras bu'i dngos por khas blangs na /
translated: having accepted that consciousness is the effect,

original: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i tshad ma lus pa gang zhig yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i tshad ma lus pa gang zhig yin te /
translated: what is the valid knowledge that is the remainder of what is desired?

original: cung zad kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: cung zad kyang ma yin no //
translated: None at all.

original: gang gi phyir byed ni shes pa tshad mar 'dod pa yin na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir byed ni shes pa tshad mar 'dod pa yin na /
translated: Why? If one asserts that the agent is a valid cognition,

original: da lta na ni shes pa yang tshad ma'i 'bras bur brjod pas /
analyzed: da lta na ni shes pa yang tshad ma'i 'bras bur brjod pas /
translated: then since the present consciousness is said to be the result of valid knowledge,

original: 'bras bu las tha dad pas tshad ma shes pa ma yin pa'i @129b bdag nyid du nges par 'gyur dgos pa des na 'bras bu tha dad par smra ba la mi 'dod pa thog tu bab po zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu las tha dad pas tshad ma shes pa ma yin pa'i @129b bdag nyid du nges par 'gyur dgos pa des na 'bras bu tha dad par smra ba la mi 'dod pa thog tu bab po zhe na /
translated: it must definitely be ascertained that the valid cognition is not of the nature of consciousness, because it is different from the result. Therefore, the unwanted consequence befalls the proponent of a different result.

original: slob dpon gyis shes pa gcig la rnam par gzhag par bya ba dang / rnam par 'jog par byed pa'i dngos pos tshad ma dang 'bras bu'i dngos po mi 'gal bar dgongs nas bshad pa ;
analyzed: slob dpon gyis shes pa gcig la rnam par gzhag par bya ba dang / rnam par 'jog par byed pa'i dngos pos tshad ma dang 'bras bu'i dngos po mi 'gal bar dgongs nas bshad pa ;
translated: The master [DignƒÅga] explained with the intention that there is no contradiction between the state of being a valid cognition and the state of being a result in a single consciousness, by means of the things to be posited and the positer.

original: gang las te byed pa po gang gzhal bya rtogs pa 'di'i de nyid de /
analyzed: gang las te byed pa po gang gzhal bya rtogs pa 'di'i de nyid de /
translated: The suchness of this‚Äîthat is, the agent who comprehends the object of comprehension‚Äî

original: gzhal bya rtogs pa nyid rnam par gzhag pa grub pa'o //
analyzed: gzhal bya rtogs pa nyid rnam par gzhag pa grub pa'o //
translated: is the establishment of the very comprehension of the object of comprehension as the thing to be posited.

original: rang gi byed brag gis bya ba'i bye brag tu byed pa po ni byed pa yin te /
analyzed: rang gi byed brag gis bya ba'i bye brag tu byed pa po ni byed pa yin te /
translated: The agent is the doer of the action by means of its own particular feature.

original: byed pa po thams cad bye brag tu byed pa po nyid yin yang /
analyzed: byed pa po thams cad bye brag tu byed pa po nyid yin yang /
translated: Although all agents are specifically agents,

original: gang zhig byed pa po gzhan la ltos pa med par bya ba bye brag tu byed pa po de ni byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig byed pa po gzhan la ltos pa med par bya ba bye brag tu byed pa po de ni byed pa yin no //
translated: that which is an agent without relying on another agent is a specific agent.

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang rang gi bye brag gis rnam par gzhag par bya ba don rtogs pa bye brag tu sgrub pa'i byed pa ni gang zhig rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu mtshan ltos par bya ba'i byed pa po gzhan gyis mchod pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang rang gi bye brag gis rnam par gzhag par bya ba don rtogs pa bye brag tu sgrub pa'i byed pa ni gang zhig rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu mtshan ltos par bya ba'i byed pa po gzhan gyis mchod pa nyid yin no //
translated: In the same way, here, the specific agent that establishes the object of comprehension to be posited by its specific attributes is that which is worshipped by another agent that is the reason for positing it.

original: 'di ltar gang la ltos kyang don rtogs pa rnam par mi gnas na ni rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu mtshan de las gzhan la ltos par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar gang la ltos kyang don rtogs pa rnam par mi gnas na ni rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu mtshan de las gzhan la ltos par bya ba yin te /
translated: Thus, if the object of comprehension does not remain when it relies on something else, then it relies on something else that is the reason for positing it.

original: des na snga ma de bar du chod pa na rang gi bye brag gis bya ba'i bye brag tu byed pa por mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: des na snga ma de bar du chod pa na rang gi bye brag gis bya ba'i bye brag tu byed pa por mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: Therefore, the former, when interrupted by that, would not be a specific agent of the action by its specific attributes.

original: 'on kyang ltos par bya ba gzhan gang yin pa de nyid par du ma chod par rang gi bye brag gis bye brag tu byed pa por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang ltos par bya ba gzhan gang yin pa de nyid par du ma chod par rang gi bye brag gis bye brag tu byed pa por 'gyur ro //
translated: But that very other which is the object of dependence would be the maker of the distinction by its own particular, without anything intervening.

original: de ston pa ni bar chad med par zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ston pa ni bar chad med par zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The demonstration of that is ‚Äúwithout anything intervening.‚Äù

original: gang las 'di la bar chad par du gcod pa po ltos par bya ba gzhan med pa ste /
analyzed: gang las 'di la bar chad par du gcod pa po ltos par bya ba gzhan med pa ste /
translated: From that, there is no other object of dependence here that is an obstruction.

original: gzhan gyis par du mchod par gyur pa na 'di'i de nyid 'grub par byed pa gang yin pa de ni byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyis par du mchod par gyur pa na 'di'i de nyid 'grub par byed pa gang yin pa de ni byed pa yin no //
translated: When it is not obstructed by another, that which accomplishes its reality is the maker.

original: de la ste tshul de ltar gnas pa na'o //
analyzed: de la ste tshul de ltar gnas pa na'o //
translated: ‚Äú In that case,‚Äù i.e., in that way of being,

original: ltos par bya ba gzhan gyis bar du ma chod par rang gi bye brag gis bye brag tu byed pa po byed pa yin pa dang / don gyi khyad par rtogs pa ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no zhes tshul de lta yin pa na'o //
analyzed: ltos par bya ba gzhan gyis bar du ma chod par rang gi bye brag gis bye brag tu byed pa po byed pa yin pa dang / don gyi khyad par rtogs pa ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no zhes tshul de lta yin pa na'o //
translated: when there is no obstruction by another object of dependence, the maker is the maker of the distinction by its own particular, and the understanding of the particular object is the effect of the valid cognition. In that case,

original: don dang 'brel par byas pa rtogs pa 'di'i don dang 'brel par byed pa ni don lta bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de'i dngos po don gyi rang bzhin nyid min pa gzhan ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: don dang 'brel par byas pa rtogs pa 'di'i don dang 'brel par byed pa ni don lta bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de'i dngos po don gyi rang bzhin nyid min pa gzhan ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúrelated to the object‚Äù is this: there is nothing that is not the nature of the object, the entity that is related to the object.

original: 'brel par byed pa yang sgrub byed yin la /
analyzed: 'brel par byed pa yang sgrub byed yin la /
translated: The proof is the relation.

original: 'brel par byas pa rtogs pa yang 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: 'brel par byas pa rtogs pa yang 'bras bu ste /
translated: The understanding of the object that is related to the object is the result.

original: de'i phyir gzhal bya rtogs pa gzhal bya dang 'brel par byas pa rnam par gzhag @130a * //üîΩpar bya ba'i tshad ma ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhal bya rtogs pa gzhal bya dang 'brel par byas pa rnam par gzhag @130a * // par bya ba'i tshad ma ste /
translated: Therefore, the valid cognition that is related to the object is the one that is posited as the understanding of the object.

original: rnam par 'jog par byed pa nyid kyis sgrub byed dam par gyur pa ni gzhal bya'i rang bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: rnam par 'jog par byed pa nyid kyis sgrub byed dam par gyur pa ni gzhal bya'i rang bzhin nyid de /
translated: The proof is the best because it is the positer. The nature of the object is the best because it is the one that is related to the object.

original: don dang 'dra ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: don dang 'dra ba nyid yin no //
translated: It is similar to the object.

original: skyed par byed pa'i rgyu de nyid rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin pa'i phyir don dang 'dra ba nyid sgrub par byed par ci'i phyir brjod ;
analyzed: skyed par byed pa'i rgyu de nyid rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin pa'i phyir don dang 'dra ba nyid sgrub par byed par ci'i phyir brjod ;
translated: Why is the cause that produces the cognition called the proof of similarity to the object?

original: gang gi phyir de rtogs pa'i bya ba skyed par nus na rnam par 'jog pa yang ji ltar mi nus /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de rtogs pa'i bya ba skyed par nus na rnam par 'jog pa yang ji ltar mi nus /
translated: If it is able to generate the activity of understanding, then why is it not able to posit?

original: rnam par 'jog pa po yin na yang ji ltar de'i skyed par byed pa por mi 'gyur zhe na /üîΩgang gi phyir bsgrub par bya ba yin pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad thams cad kyi bsgrub par bya ba ma yin la /
analyzed: rnam par 'jog pa po yin na yang ji ltar de'i skyed par byed pa por mi 'gyur zhe na / gang gi phyir bsgrub par bya ba yin pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad thams cad kyi bsgrub par bya ba ma yin la /
translated: And if it is the positer, then why is it not the producer of that?üîΩBecause it is the object to be established, not everything is the object to be established for everything.

original: gang gi phyir sgrub par byed pa yin pa de'i phyir thams cad gang cung zad bya ba yin pa de'i sgrub par byed pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgrub par byed pa yin pa de'i phyir thams cad gang cung zad bya ba yin pa de'i sgrub par byed pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And because it is the proof, not everything that is an object of activity is the proof.

original: 'o na ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: How is it, then?

original: bshad pa / 'on kyang zhes bya ba ni khyad par ston pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa / 'on kyang zhes bya ba ni khyad par ston pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHowever‚Äù indicates a distinction.

original: sgrub par byed pa gang las bya ba gang 'grub pa de ni de'i sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa gang las bya ba gang 'grub pa de ni de'i sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: That which is the proof from which an object of activity is established is the proof of that.

original: des na 'ga' zhig ni rnam par shes pa bskyed pa'i bya ba'i sgrub par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: des na 'ga' zhig ni rnam par shes pa bskyed pa'i bya ba'i sgrub par byed pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, some are the proof of the activity of generating consciousness.

original: gang zhig gi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig gi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed par rtogs pa'o //
translated: It is understood that it is the cause of the cognition that follows it and is absent when it is absent.

original: 'ga' zhig gis la so sor nges pa rnam pa 'jog pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gis la so sor nges pa rnam pa 'jog pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin te /
translated: The proof of the establishment of the individual determination of some is as follows.

original: gang las shes pa de sngon po la sogs pa'i las la nges par rnam par 'jog nus pa'o //
analyzed: gang las shes pa de sngon po la sogs pa'i las la nges par rnam par 'jog nus pa'o //
translated: From that, it is possible to determine the individual determination of blue, etc.

original: des na 'di ni don dam pa yin te /
analyzed: des na 'di ni don dam pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is the ultimate.

original: 'ga' zhig gis 'ga' zhig bskyed pa'i bya ba byed pa na /üîΩbyed pa po yin pa'i phyir rnam par 'jog pa yang de nyid kyis byed pa'am /üîΩrnam par 'jog par byed pa na yang de'i skyed par byed pa yin no zhes de ltar rnam par gzhag par ni nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gis 'ga' zhig bskyed pa'i bya ba byed pa na / byed pa po yin pa'i phyir rnam par 'jog pa yang de nyid kyis byed pa'am / rnam par 'jog par byed pa na yang de'i skyed par byed pa yin no zhes de ltar rnam par gzhag par ni nus pa ma yin no //
translated: When some produce some,üîΩit is not possible to posit that the producer is the producer because it produces,üîΩor that when it is posited, it is the producer because it produces.

original: gang gi phyir bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos por rnam par gzhag pa'am /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos por rnam par gzhag pa'am /
translated: Because the thing that is produced and the thing that produces it are not posited as different.

original: rnam par gzhag 'jog gi dngos po phongs pas rnam par brtags pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rnam par gzhag 'jog gi dngos po phongs pas rnam par brtags pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: The thing that is posited and the thing that posits it are not posited as different.

original: 'on kyang reg bas nges par brtags pa na gang zhig ji ltar 'byor pa ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang reg bas nges par brtags pa na gang zhig ji ltar 'byor pa ste /
translated: But when one examines by touch, one should determine the arrangement of the parts in accordance with the way they are joined together.

original: de ltar rnam par gzhag par bya ba yin no//
analyzed: de ltar rnam par gzhag par bya ba yin no//
translated: Thus, the arrangement is to be determined.

original: 'ga' zhig ni skye ba'i sgrub par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ni skye ba'i sgrub par byed pa yin la /
translated: Some are the means of production,

original: 'ga' zhig ni rnam par gzhag pa'i yin te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ni rnam par gzhag pa'i yin te /
translated: and some are the means of arrangement.

original: gang las skyes pa dang gang las rnam par gzhag par rig pa'o //
analyzed: gang las skyes pa dang gang las rnam par gzhag par rig pa'o //
translated: One should understand from what they are produced and from what they are arranged.

original: gang gi phyir skyed par byed pa dag las ni don rtogs par rnam par gzhag pa mi 'thad pa de'i phyir sgrub par byed pa gzhan tshol ba @130b yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir skyed par byed pa dag las ni don rtogs par rnam par gzhag pa mi 'thad pa de'i phyir sgrub par byed pa gzhan tshol ba @130b yin no //
translated: Since it is not tenable that the object is understood from the means of production, therefore one should seek another means of establishment.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni gang gi sgrub par byed pa'i dngos por 'thad pa de ni de'i sgrub par rnam par gzhag par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tshul 'di rnam par gnas pa na'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni gang gi sgrub par byed pa'i dngos por 'thad pa de ni de'i sgrub par rnam par gzhag par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tshul 'di rnam par gnas pa na'o //
translated: When this is the case, that is, when the method is established as the means of establishment, then that is to be determined as the means of establishment.

original: nyams su myong ba ni 'dzin par byed pa nyid de /üîΩ'dzin pa'i rnam pa de kho na'am /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba ni 'dzin par byed pa nyid de / 'dzin pa'i rnam pa de kho na'am /
translated: Experience is the apprehension itself.

original: de tsam mo //
analyzed: de tsam mo //
translated: That is the form of apprehension, or it is just that.

original: 'dzin par byed pa'i rang bzhin de 'dra ba'i bdag nyid dang 'dra ba'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par shes pa ni'o //
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa'i rang bzhin de 'dra ba'i bdag nyid dang 'dra ba'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par shes pa ni'o //
translated: The consciousness that has a nature like that of the self that is the grasper.

original: 'dis ni rnam par dbye ba mi nus pa nyid kyi rgyu bstan te /
analyzed: 'dis ni rnam par dbye ba mi nus pa nyid kyi rgyu bstan te /
translated: This shows the reason why they cannot be distinguished.

original: nyams su myong ba rang bzhin khyad par med pa la khyad par du rnam par gzhag pa mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba rang bzhin khyad par med pa la khyad par du rnam par gzhag pa mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible to posit a difference in the nature of the experience, which is undifferentiated.

original: gang gi phyir sngon po'i don dmigs pa ni shes pa'i rang gi rang bzhin dmigs pa'i bdag nyid kho na ste /üîΩgcig ni don gyi yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sngon po'i don dmigs pa ni shes pa'i rang gi rang bzhin dmigs pa'i bdag nyid kho na ste / gcig ni don gyi yin la /
translated: Because the perception of the object blue is the nature of the consciousness itself, which is the perceiver.üîΩOne is the object‚Äôs, and the other is the self‚Äôs.

original: gzhan ni bdag nyid kyi yin pa dmigs pa gnyis ni med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan ni bdag nyid kyi yin pa dmigs pa gnyis ni med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is no perception of two.

original: yul dmigs pa bdag nyid dmigs pa'i bdag nyid yin na yang rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid la khyad par med pa'i phyir shes pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid dmigs pa khyad par med pa dang / de dang tha dad pa med pas don dmigs pa yang khyad par med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yul dmigs pa bdag nyid dmigs pa'i bdag nyid yin na yang rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid la khyad par med pa'i phyir shes pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid dmigs pa khyad par med pa dang / de dang tha dad pa med pas don dmigs pa yang khyad par med par 'gyur te /
translated: And since it would not be different from that, the object of perception would not be different.

original: de'i phyir na sngon po dmigs kyi ser po ni ma yin no zhes shes pa'i yul so so la 'brel pa nges pa 'dir mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir na sngon po dmigs kyi ser po ni ma yin no zhes shes pa'i yul so so la 'brel pa nges pa 'dir mi 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, this would not be the case: ‚ÄúI perceive blue, but I do not perceive yellow.‚Äù

original: 'brel pa nges pa med na yang don nges par myong bar rab tu grags pa nyams par 'gyur ro //üîΩdes na nyams su myong ba'i rang bzhin du bye brag med pa 'di ni gang gis las so so la ste /
analyzed: 'brel pa nges pa med na yang don nges par myong bar rab tu grags pa nyams par 'gyur ro // des na nyams su myong ba'i rang bzhin du bye brag med pa 'di ni gang gis las so so la ste /
translated: And if there were no ascertainment of the connection, then the well-known experience of ascertaining the object would be undermined.üîΩTherefore, this undifferentiated nature of experience must be made to be the nature of the object of each action.

original: las dang las la rnam par 'byid pa zhes bya ba gzhan dang gzhan du rnam par gnas pa yul / nges pa de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur bar bya dgos so //
analyzed: las dang las la rnam par 'byid pa zhes bya ba gzhan dang gzhan du rnam par gnas pa yul / nges pa de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur bar bya dgos so //
translated: The object must be made to be the nature of the ascertainment of the object in each action, which is to say, the object must be made to be the nature of the ascertainment of the object in each action, which is to say, the object must be made to be the nature of the ascertainment of the object in each action, which is to say, the object must be made to be the nature of the ascertainment of the object in each action, which is to say, the object must be made to be the nature of the ascertainment of the object in each action, which is to say, the object must be made to be the nature of the ascertainment of the object in each action, which is to say, the object must be made to be the nature of the ascertainment of the object in each action, which is to say, the object must be made to be the nature of the ascertainment of the object in each action, which is to say, the object must be made to be the nature of the ascertainment of the object in each action, which is to say, the object must be made to be the nature of the ascertainment of the object in each action, which is to say, the object must be made to be the nature of the ascertainment of the object in each action, which is to say, the object must be made to be the nature of the ascertainment of the object in each action, which is to say, the object must be made to be the nature of the ascertainment of the object in each action, which is to say, the object must be made to be the nature of the ascertainment of the object in each action, which is to say, the object must be made to be the nature of the ascertainment of the object in each action, which is to say, the object must be made

original: gang gi phyir las kyi gnas su gyur pa'i yongs su gcad pa'i yul ni las su brjod do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir las kyi gnas su gyur pa'i yongs su gcad pa'i yul ni las su brjod do //
translated: Because the object that is determined in the locus of activity is called the object of activity.

original: rnam par gnas pa'i rnam pa ston pa ni 'di ni sngon po'i yin la /
analyzed: rnam par gnas pa'i rnam pa ston pa ni 'di ni sngon po'i yin la /
translated: The indication of the mode of abiding is this: ‚ÄúThis is the object of the blue,‚Äù

original: 'di ni gzhan gyi yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gzhan gyi yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: and ‚ÄúThis is the object of the other.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir bdag nyid kyi khyad par ram 'brel pa can gyi khyad par las 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bdag nyid kyi khyad par ram 'brel pa can gyi khyad par las 'gyur te /
translated: Because it is due to the difference in the self or the difference in the related object,

original: 'brel pa can gyi khyad par gang gis khyad par med pa'i shes pa de khyad par can du rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur par bya dgos so zhes ci'i phyir brjod par byed //
analyzed: 'brel pa can gyi khyad par gang gis khyad par med pa'i shes pa de khyad par can du rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur par bya dgos so zhes ci'i phyir brjod par byed //
translated: why is it said that ‚Äúit must be made to be of the nature of that, because the cognition that is undifferentiated by the difference in the related object is posited as differentiated by that difference‚Äù?

original: shel gyi rang bzhin khyad par med kyang nye bar gzhag pa de dag 'brel pas khyad par can du rtogs @131a * //
analyzed: shel gyi rang bzhin khyad par med kyang nye bar gzhag pa de dag 'brel pas khyad par can du rtogs @131a * //
translated: Even though the nature of the crystal is undifferentiated, the related objects are understood to be differentiated by their arrangement.üîΩIn the same way, cognition is differentiated by the power of the related object.

original: pa de bzhin du shes pa yang 'brel pa can gyi dbang gis rnam par 'byed pa yin no zhe na de'i phyir de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa zhes smos so //
analyzed: pa de bzhin du shes pa yang 'brel pa can gyi dbang gis rnam par 'byed pa yin no zhe na de'i phyir de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa zhes smos so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúit is not of the nature of that.‚Äù

original: ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
translated: The word ‚Äúni‚Äù has the meaning of ‚Äúbecause.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir bdag nyid ma yin pa nges par byed pa ma yin pa de'i phyir zhes rgyang ring por brjod pa dang 'brel par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bdag nyid ma yin pa nges par byed pa ma yin pa de'i phyir zhes rgyang ring por brjod pa dang 'brel par bya'o //
translated: Because it is not ascertained as the self, therefore it is connected with the expression ‚Äúat a distance.‚Äù

original: bdag nyid du ma gyur pa gang yin pa de yod pa ni dbang po la sogs pa 'brel pa can rnams la yod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bdag nyid du ma gyur pa gang yin pa de yod pa ni dbang po la sogs pa 'brel pa can rnams la yod par 'gyur te /
translated: That which does not exist as the self exists in the sense faculties and so on that are related to it,

original: de dag ni rgyu'i dngos pos nye ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdbang po dang don dang phrad pa zhes bya ba dbang po dang don dag gi 'brel pa dang / de dag la sogs pa ni yid la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag ste /
analyzed: de dag ni rgyu'i dngos pos nye ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro // dbang po dang don dang phrad pa zhes bya ba dbang po dang don dag gi 'brel pa dang / de dag la sogs pa ni yid la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag ste /
translated: because they are proximate by the nature of being its causes, and not because of anything else.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúwhen there is contact between a sense faculty and an object‚Äù indicates the relationship between a sense faculty and an object.

original: shes pa'i rgyu de rnams la yod kyang ste /
analyzed: shes pa'i rgyu de rnams la yod kyang ste /
translated: That which exists in those causes of consciousness exists in the mind and so on.

original: re zhig bye brag ni med mod kyi 'ga' zhig la bye brag yod kyang yul zhes bya ba'i las kyi bye brag tha dad par gyur ba la bdag nyid tha dad pa med pa'i khyad par med cing mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid kyi shes pa de'i
analyzed: re zhig bye brag ni med mod kyi 'ga' zhig la bye brag yod kyang yul zhes bya ba'i las kyi bye brag tha dad par gyur ba la bdag nyid tha dad pa med pa'i khyad par med cing mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid kyi shes pa de'i
translated: But there is no difference in the nature of the cognition that is the same in all cases.

original: nges par byed pa po ma yin pa de'i phyir byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nges par byed pa po ma yin pa de'i phyir byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not the agent.

original: gang gi phyir shes pa yul tha dad pa la nges pa nyid yin na ni phyi rol gyi bye brag kyang shes par gtogs pa'i bye brag gi rgyu nyid kyis shes par gtogs pa'i bye brag nges pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba yin na dbang po la sogs par gtogs
analyzed: gang gi phyir shes pa yul tha dad pa la nges pa nyid yin na ni phyi rol gyi bye brag kyang shes par gtogs pa'i bye brag gi rgyu nyid kyis shes par gtogs pa'i bye brag nges pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba yin na dbang po la sogs par gtogs
translated: If cognition were ascertained as different in relation to different objects, then the difference belonging to the external object would be the cause of the difference belonging to cognition, and the difference belonging to the external object would be the cause of the ascertainment of the difference belonging to cognition.

original: pa'i tha dad pa ni shes pa bye brag tu byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: pa'i tha dad pa ni shes pa bye brag tu byed pa ma yin te /
translated: But the difference belonging to the sense faculty and so on is not the cause of the difference in cognition.

original: shes pa'i bye brag de nyid byed par thal ba'i phyir dang / phyi rol ni brtags par bya ba yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: shes pa'i bye brag de nyid byed par thal ba'i phyir dang / phyi rol ni brtags par bya ba yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it follows that the difference belonging to cognition would be the cause, and because the external object is to be investigated.

original: bdag nyid tha dad pa med pa zhes gang brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid tha dad pa med pa zhes gang brjod pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúNon-difference‚Äù is what is meant.

original: de'i phyir shes pa dang shes bya dag mi 'brel la /
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa dang shes bya dag mi 'brel la /
translated: Therefore, the object and the cognition are not related.

original: shes pa dang don ma 'brel na yang bye brag 'di gzhal bya rtogs pa'i sgrub par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes pa dang don ma 'brel na yang bye brag 'di gzhal bya rtogs pa'i sgrub par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And if the object and the cognition are not related, then the particular cognition cannot be the proof of the object‚Äôs existence.

original: gal te byed par gyur pa'i bye brag ni rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis 'di ltar gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te byed par gyur pa'i bye brag ni rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis 'di ltar gyur pa yin te /
translated: If the particular cognition is the proof of the object‚Äôs existence, then the particular cognition itself, by its own nature, would be the proof.

original: gang gis rnam par shes pa'i bye brag ma byas kyang nges par byed pa por 'gyur ba de'i phyir don la so sor nges ba ni shes pa'i bye brag sngon du 'gro ba can ma yin no zhe na de ni de ltar mi rigs te /
analyzed: gang gis rnam par shes pa'i bye brag ma byas kyang nges par byed pa por 'gyur ba de'i phyir don la so sor nges ba ni shes pa'i bye brag sngon du 'gro ba can ma yin no zhe na de ni de ltar mi rigs te /
translated: Even if the particular cognition does not produce the cognition of the object, it would still be the proof. Therefore, the particular cognition is not preceded by the cognition of the object.üîΩThis is not tenable.

original: gang gi phyir gang zhig gi mthus rang bzhin khyad par med kyang rang gi ngo bos bya ba bye brag tu 'gyur ba rang bzhin gyis byed pa zhes bya bar gnas pa ni 'ga' yang med kyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang zhig gi mthus rang bzhin khyad par med kyang rang gi ngo bos bya ba bye brag tu 'gyur ba rang bzhin gyis byed pa zhes bya bar gnas pa ni 'ga' yang med kyi /
translated: Because there is nothing that, by its own power, would be the proof of the object, even though it is not different from the object by nature.

original: 'on kyang byed pa'i de nyid ni bye brag tu byed pa po nyid ces bya ba'i @131b don no //
analyzed: 'on kyang byed pa'i de nyid ni bye brag tu byed pa po nyid ces bya ba'i @131b don no //
translated: However, the reality of the agent is the meaning of the term ‚Äúagent‚Äù itself.

original: bsgrub bar bya ba'i rgyu mtshan ni bye brag gi rgyu'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bar bya ba'i rgyu mtshan ni bye brag gi rgyu'o //
translated: The reason for the accomplishment is the cause of the distinction.

original: rang gi bye brag gis bya ba'i bye brag byed pa na sgrub par byed pa 'ga' zhig byed par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: rang gi bye brag gis bya ba'i bye brag byed pa na sgrub par byed pa 'ga' zhig byed par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: When the distinction of the action is made by the distinction of the agent, then some cause of the accomplishment is made.

original: bya ba'i bye brag byed pa med par ni 'ga' yang byed pa zhes bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: bya ba'i bye brag byed pa med par ni 'ga' yang byed pa zhes bya ba ma yin no //
translated: But without the distinction of the action, nothing is called ‚Äúthe agent.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir byed pa'i byed pa nyid ni bye brag gi rgyu nyid yin pa des na de bya ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dbang po la sogs pa rnams la bye brag rnam par gnas kyang shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bya ba bye brag tu mi byed na
analyzed: gang gi phyir byed pa'i byed pa nyid ni bye brag gi rgyu nyid yin pa des na de bya ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dbang po la sogs pa rnams la bye brag rnam par gnas kyang shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bya ba bye brag tu mi byed na
translated: Since the cause of the distinction is the cause of the action of the agent, therefore, since it is the cause of the action, even though the distinction of the sense faculties, etc., is present, if they do not make the distinction of the action characterized by cognition,

original: / nges par byed pa ma yin pa ni byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: / nges par byed pa ma yin pa ni byed pa ma yin no //
translated: then they are not the agent because they are not the cause of the action.

original: 'di snyam du 'o na ni 'brel pa can nyid kyis shes pa bye brag tu byed par 'gyur gyi gang las rnam pa dang bcas par thal bar 'gyur ba rang bzhin gyi khyad par 'jog pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di snyam du 'o na ni 'brel pa can nyid kyis shes pa bye brag tu byed par 'gyur gyi gang las rnam pa dang bcas par thal bar 'gyur ba rang bzhin gyi khyad par 'jog pas ni ma yin no //
translated: But if you think, ‚ÄúIn that case, the connection itself would make the cognition distinct, not the establishment of a specific intrinsic nature that would entail the consequence of having aspects,‚Äù

original: 'brel pa ba yang bye brag tu byed pa po yin pa des na nges par byed par 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: 'brel pa ba yang bye brag tu byed pa po yin pa des na nges par byed par 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: then the connection itself would be the distinguisher, and thus it would be the determiner.

original: bshad pa / byed par 'dod pa'i bye brag de khyad par med na /
analyzed: bshad pa / byed par 'dod pa'i bye brag de khyad par med na /
translated: NƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds: If the distinguisher that is asserted to be the action is not distinct,

original: rang nyid la bye brag med na bya ba de'i khyad par yang mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: rang nyid la bye brag med na bya ba de'i khyad par yang mi 'grub bo //
translated: then since it is not distinct from itself, that action is not established as distinct.

original: des na de nges par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de nges par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore it is not the determiner.üîΩBecause the distinguisher that is connected to the sense faculty is also distinguished by the action that is not distinct from its intrinsic nature,

original: gang gi phyir dbang po la gnas pa'i khyad par 'brel pa can gyis kyang rang bzhin bye brag med pa'i bya ba yang khyad par du byas pa yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dbang po la gnas pa'i khyad par 'brel pa can gyis kyang rang bzhin bye brag med pa'i bya ba yang khyad par du byas pa yin la /
translated: and

original: byed par 'dod pa'i khyad par 'brel pa can de yang don rnams la thun mong du khyad par med pa'i phyir 'brel pa can des bya ba khyad par du byed par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: byed par 'dod pa'i khyad par 'brel pa can de yang don rnams la thun mong du khyad par med pa'i phyir 'brel pa can des bya ba khyad par du byed par ga la 'gyur /
translated: And since that which is related, the particular that is the object of the desire to act, is not a shared particular of objects, how could that which is related make the action particular?

original: 'di snyam du don la gnas pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par ni 'brel pa can yin la /
analyzed: 'di snyam du don la gnas pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par ni 'brel pa can yin la /
translated: If you think that the particular aspect that exists in the object is related,

original: 'brel pa can des ni shes pa'i don so so la nges pa rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir nges par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pa can des ni shes pa'i don so so la nges pa rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir nges par byed pa yin te /
translated: and that because that which is related determines the object of consciousness, it is the determiner,

original: don la gnas pa'i rnam pa ni thun mong ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: don la gnas pa'i rnam pa ni thun mong ma yin no snyam na /
translated: and that the particular aspect that exists in the object is not shared.

original: don la gnas pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par yod kyang bya ba'i khyad par de'i yang lag ma yin pas byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don la gnas pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par yod kyang bya ba'i khyad par de'i yang lag ma yin pas byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even though the particular aspect of blue and so on that exists in the object exists, it is not the particular of the action and it is not the agent because it is not the limb of that.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is said:

original: gal te don la gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam par bye brag don so so la tha dad pa yin pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: gal te don la gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam par bye brag don so so la tha dad pa yin pa de lta na yang /
translated: Even though the particular of the aspect that exists in the object is different for each object,

original: 'di shes pa'i khyad par rnam par 'jog pa'i yan lag ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di shes pa'i khyad par rnam par 'jog pa'i yan lag ni ma yin te /
translated: This is not a branch that establishes the distinction of knowing this.

original: gang gi phyir de ni nyams su ma myong ba kho na yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ni nyams su ma myong ba kho na yin la /
translated: Because that is not experienced at all,

original: rtogs pa nyams su myong ba na yang ma shes pa da dang 'brel pa nyid du shes par nus pa ma yin pas na de dang 'brel ba nyid kyis khyad par du rnam par gzhag lta ci smos /üîΩ'di ltar 'di sngon po dang @132a * //
analyzed: rtogs pa nyams su myong ba na yang ma shes pa da dang 'brel pa nyid du shes par nus pa ma yin pas na de dang 'brel ba nyid kyis khyad par du rnam par gzhag lta ci smos / 'di ltar 'di sngon po dang @132a * //
translated: and when the realization is experienced, it is not possible to know that it is related to what was not known, so how could it be established as a distinction by being related to that?

original: 'bral lam 'on te gzhan dang 'brel pa zhes rang bzhin khyad par med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa la the tshom za bas ji ltar na the tshom za ba'i rang bzhin gyi sngon po dang 'brel pa can des the tshom za ba'i rang bzhin de nyid nges
analyzed: 'bral lam 'on te gzhan dang 'brel pa zhes rang bzhin khyad par med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa la the tshom za bas ji ltar na the tshom za ba'i rang bzhin gyi sngon po dang 'brel pa can des the tshom za ba'i rang bzhin de nyid nges
translated: Thus, since it is uncertain whether consciousness is related to blue or to something else, because its nature is not distinguished, how could it ascertain that very nature which is uncertain, by being related to blue which has an uncertain nature?

original: par byed / gzhan la gnas pa'i khyad par yang ma nges pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: par byed / gzhan la gnas pa'i khyad par yang ma nges pa kho na yin no //
translated: The distinction that resides in another is also just uncertain.

original: de nges pa ni shes pa kho nas byas pa yin na khyad par ma shes pa de yang ji ltar khyad par can 'dzin par byed pa 'gyur shing khyad par gang gis de khyad par can du rnam par gzhag / de'i phyir ji srid du rnam par shes
analyzed: de nges pa ni shes pa kho nas byas pa yin na khyad par ma shes pa de yang ji ltar khyad par can 'dzin par byed pa 'gyur shing khyad par gang gis de khyad par can du rnam par gzhag / de'i phyir ji srid du rnam par shes
translated: If it is ascertained by cognition alone, then how could that which does not cognize the difference be the apprehender of the qualifier? By what difference is it established as a qualifier?

original: pa las tha dad pa'i khyad par 'brel pa can shes pa'i bye brag rnam par gnas pa'i rgyu brtags pa de ni rnam pa gnyis kyis 'brel pa ma yin te /
analyzed: pa las tha dad pa'i khyad par 'brel pa can shes pa'i bye brag rnam par gnas pa'i rgyu brtags pa de ni rnam pa gnyis kyis 'brel pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, as long as the cause of the distinction of the cognition related to the different qualifier is investigated, it is not related in two ways.

original: thun mong ba'i phyir dang thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyang ma shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thun mong ba'i phyir dang thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyang ma shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is common and because it is not known to be uncommon.

original: de shes na ni de dang 'brel pa khyad par can yang shes par 'gyu rna /
analyzed: de shes na ni de dang 'brel pa khyad par can yang shes par 'gyu rna /
translated: If it is known, then the related difference is also known.

original: shes pa las tha dad pa de ni rang gi ngo bos shes par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: shes pa las tha dad pa de ni rang gi ngo bos shes par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: That which is different from cognition is not cognized by its own nature.

original: da ltar ni 'dzin par byed pa'i shes pa yang 'ga' zhig 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: da ltar ni 'dzin par byed pa'i shes pa yang 'ga' zhig 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: Now, the cognition that apprehends is not tenable in any way.

original: de nyid dpyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid dpyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the investigation of that itself.

original: de'i phyir tha dad pa'i khyad par nyams su myong ba'i phyir med pa dang 'dra ba ni khyad par rnam par gnas pa'i yan lag ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de'i phyir tha dad pa'i khyad par nyams su myong ba'i phyir med pa dang 'dra ba ni khyad par rnam par gnas pa'i yan lag ma yin zhing /
translated: Therefore, because the experience of a distinct difference is like a non-existent difference, it is not a part of a distinct difference.

original: yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir yang nges par byed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir yang nges par byed pa ma yin la /
translated: And because it is not a part, it is not a determiner.

original: des na byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not a determiner.

original: de ltar na gang gi phyir bdag nyid tha dad pa med pa'i shes pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i bye brag nges par byed pa ma yin pa dang / rang gi ngo bo khyad par med pa dang / kha cig ma shes pa'i phyir 'brel pa can nyid kyi sgo nas bye brag tu byed pa po nyid ma yin pa'i phyir na gzhan bye brag tu byed pa po ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar na gang gi phyir bdag nyid tha dad pa med pa'i shes pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i bye brag nges par byed pa ma yin pa dang / rang gi ngo bo khyad par med pa dang / kha cig ma shes pa'i phyir 'brel pa can nyid kyi sgo nas bye brag tu byed pa po nyid ma yin pa'i phyir na gzhan bye brag tu byed pa po ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Thus, because it is not a determiner of a difference that is the cause of a cognition that is not a different entity, and because it is not a determiner of a difference by way of being a related object due to the absence of a distinct nature of its own and the non-cognition of some, therefore, it is not a determiner of another.

original: shes pa 'di'i bdag nyid kyi bye brag ni rang bzhin gyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: shes pa 'di'i bdag nyid kyi bye brag ni rang bzhin gyi khyad par ro //
translated: The difference in the nature of this cognition is a natural distinction.

original: gang las te bdag nyid kyi khyad par gang gi phyir yul zhes bya ba'i lam ma nges pa'o //
analyzed: gang las te bdag nyid kyi khyad par gang gi phyir yul zhes bya ba'i lam ma nges pa'o //
translated: From what? From the distinction of its own nature. The path of the so-called object is uncertain.

original: nges pa ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: nges pa ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What kind of ascertainment is it?

original: bshad pa / sngon po 'de'i rtog pa ni 'di yin no zhes 'di 'dra ba'i don gzhan rnam par bcad nas rtogs pa 'di'i don gcig la nges pa ste /
analyzed: bshad pa / sngon po 'de'i rtog pa ni 'di yin no zhes 'di 'dra ba'i don gzhan rnam par bcad nas rtogs pa 'di'i don gcig la nges pa ste /
translated: It is said: The ascertainment of the object is the ascertainment of the object as one, having understood it by excluding other objects of a similar type, such as ‚ÄúThis is the conception of blue.‚Äù

original: nges pa 'di nyid ni don dang 'brel par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: nges pa 'di nyid ni don dang 'brel par brjod pa yin no //
translated: This ascertainment is the expression related to the object.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi bye brag gang las 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid kyi bye brag de ni sgrub par byed pa yin @132b no ;
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi bye brag gang las 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid kyi bye brag de ni sgrub par byed pa yin @132b no ;
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to the particular of the self, and the particular of the self that is the basis of the change is the proof.

original: / de ni zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa'i sgra dang gzhi mthun pa'i phyir na ning ngo //
analyzed: / de ni zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa'i sgra dang gzhi mthun pa'i phyir na ning ngo //
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù is the past tense of the word ‚Äúproof‚Äù because it is a common locus.

original: 'di snyam du bdag nyid kyi bye brag kho na las don dang 'brel pa yin du chug kyang /
analyzed: 'di snyam du bdag nyid kyi bye brag kho na las don dang 'brel pa yin du chug kyang /
translated: One might think that although it is possible that the particular of the self alone is related to the object,

original: don dang 'dra bas byas pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: don dang 'dra bas byas pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
translated: how do you know that it is produced in a way that is similar to the object?

original: shes pa'i zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: shes pa'i zhes gsungs te /
translated: The text says ‚Äúof consciousness.‚Äù

original: gal te 'dra ba las gzhan las kyang srid na ni 'dra bas byas par gzung bar mi bya ba zhig na shes pa'i don dang 'brel pa 'di lta bu ni don dang 'dra ba las gzhan las ni srid pa ma yin no //üîΩshes pa las tha dad pa'i dbang po la sogs pa la gnas pa'i bye brag ni mi shes pa'i phyir 'brel par byed par mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te 'dra ba las gzhan las kyang srid na ni 'dra bas byas par gzung bar mi bya ba zhig na shes pa'i don dang 'brel pa 'di lta bu ni don dang 'dra ba las gzhan las ni srid pa ma yin no // shes pa las tha dad pa'i dbang po la sogs pa la gnas pa'i bye brag ni mi shes pa'i phyir 'brel par byed par mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: If it were possible for consciousness to arise from something similar to itself and also from something else, then it would not be apprehended as produced by something similar to itself. But this kind of relationship between consciousness and its object is not possible from something else that is not similar to it.üîΩBecause the difference that resides in the sense faculty, etc., which is different from consciousness is not known, it would not be related to consciousness.

original: dbang po la sogs pas byas pa shes pa la gnas pa'i bye brag ni rnam par shes pa'i spyir 'brel bar byed pa por 'gyur bar de'i phyir gzhan las ni srid pa ni ma yin no zhes ci'i phyir brjod ce na /
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pas byas pa shes pa la gnas pa'i bye brag ni rnam par shes pa'i spyir 'brel bar byed pa por 'gyur bar de'i phyir gzhan las ni srid pa ni ma yin no zhes ci'i phyir brjod ce na /
translated: But the difference that resides in consciousness, which is produced by the sense faculty, etc., would be related to the general nature of consciousness. Therefore, why is it said that it is not possible from something else?

original: dbang po la sogs pa zhes smos so //
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa zhes smos so //
translated: The sense faculty, etc., are mentioned.

original: dbang po de gsal ba dang mi gsal ba de'i dngos po ni gsal ba dang mi gsal ba nyid do ;
analyzed: dbang po de gsal ba dang mi gsal ba de'i dngos po ni gsal ba dang mi gsal ba nyid do ;
translated: The clarity and unclarity of the sense faculty is the clarity and unclarity of its nature.

original: / de la sogs pa gang dag yin pa ste /
analyzed: / de la sogs pa gang dag yin pa ste /
translated: What are included in that are the sense faculty, etc.

original: sogs pa smos pas ni goms pa bogs pa dang / ma bogs pa dang yul nye ba dang mi nye ba la sogs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas ni goms pa bogs pa dang / ma bogs pa dang yul nye ba dang mi nye ba la sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúand so on‚Äù in the root text includes the following: the degree of familiarity with the object, whether the object is fresh or stale, whether the object is near or far, and so on.

original: 'di dag gi rang gi bye brag gis dbang po'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bye brag tu 'gyur te /üîΩzas zos pa dang ma zos pa la sogs pas gnod par byas pas mi gsal ba dang / phan btogs pas gsal bar gyur pa'i dbang pos ni rnam par shes pa gsal ba dang mi gsal ba 'dzin par byed pa dang / sngon goms pas 'dus bya sad pa'i yid la byed pa yang 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i shes pa'i rgyu 'gyur te /üîΩ'di yang skabs ji lta ba bzhin du sgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di dag gi rang gi bye brag gis dbang po'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bye brag tu 'gyur te / zas zos pa dang ma zos pa la sogs pas gnod par byas pas mi gsal ba dang / phan btogs pas gsal bar gyur pa'i dbang pos ni rnam par shes pa gsal ba dang mi gsal ba 'dzin par byed pa dang / sngon goms pas 'dus bya sad pa'i yid la byed pa yang 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i shes pa'i rgyu 'gyur te / 'di yang skabs ji lta ba bzhin du sgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The specific characteristics of these conditions give rise to the specific characteristics of the sensory consciousnesses.

original: yul nye na gsal la nye ba ma yin na mi gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas rtogs par bya ba'o //
analyzed: yul nye na gsal la nye ba ma yin na mi gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas rtogs par bya ba'o //
