The sensory consciousnesses are also clear or unclear depending on whether the mind is in a state of realization of the result of the path of vision or

original: de ltar dbang po dang yid la byed pa dang yul gyi bye brag rnams rang gi bye brag gis bye brag tu gyur pa na de ltar shes pa dga' ba la sogs pa'i bye brag rnams dang sbyor bar byed pa yin yang don dang sbyor bar byed pa
analyzed: de ltar dbang po dang yid la byed pa dang yul gyi bye brag rnams rang gi bye brag gis bye brag tu gyur pa na de ltar shes pa dga' ba la sogs pa'i bye brag rnams dang sbyor bar byed pa yin yang don dang sbyor bar byed pa
translated: Thus, when the distinctions of the sense faculties, mental activity, and objects are distinguished by their own distinctions, the distinctions of the consciousnesses such as pleasure are also distinguished.

original: ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ni ma yin no //
translated: However, they are not connected with their objects.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de las zhes smos te /
analyzed: de las zhes smos te /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúbecause of that.‚Äù

original: dbang po la sogs ba bye brag tu byed par gyur ba la nye ba ste /
analyzed: dbang po la sogs ba bye brag tu byed par gyur ba la nye ba ste /
translated: The cause of connection is the distinction of the sense faculties, etc.

original: 'brel pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is absent because it does not exist.

original: dbang po la sogs pa'i bye brag tu byed pa'i dngos pos 'brel pa'i @133a * //
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa'i bye brag tu byed pa'i dngos pos 'brel pa'i @133a * //
translated: The absence of a cause of connection by the distinction of the sense faculties, etc.,

original: rgyu med pa mtshon par byas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu med pa mtshon par byas pa'o //
translated: is indicated.

original: dbang po la sogs pa'i bye brag la ni shes pa dang nye ba'i rgyu yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa'i bye brag la ni shes pa dang nye ba'i rgyu yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The distinction of the sense faculties, etc., is not the cause of the proximity of consciousness.

original: 'di ltar nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba dbang pos byas pa'i shes pa'i bye brag yod kyang don thams cad la thun mong ba yin pa nyid kyis nges pa ma yin pa'i dang nye ba'i rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba dbang pos byas pa'i shes pa'i bye brag yod kyang don thams cad la thun mong ba yin pa nyid kyis nges pa ma yin pa'i dang nye ba'i rgyu ma yin no //
translated: Thus, what is called ‚Äúexperience‚Äù is a particular kind of cognition produced by the sense faculty, but it is not a specific cause because it is common to all objects.

original: ji ltar dbang pos byas pa'i gsal ba ni sngon po la ji lta bar ser po la yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa thun mong bar sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar dbang pos byas pa'i gsal ba ni sngon po la ji lta bar ser po la yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa thun mong bar sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Just as the clarity produced by the sense faculty is common to blue and yellow, etc.,

original: don gyis byas pa'i bye brag don dang 'dra ba zhes grags pa nyid ni nye ba'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: don gyis byas pa'i bye brag don dang 'dra ba zhes grags pa nyid ni nye ba'i rgyu yin te /
translated: The specific cause is the particular of the object, which is known as ‚Äúlike the object,‚Äù because it is the specific cause.

original: don so so la tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don so so la tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is different for each object.

original: des na dbang po la sogs pa zhes smos pas yul ma bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: des na dbang po la sogs pa zhes smos pas yul ma bzung ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, by mentioning the sense faculty, etc., the object is not grasped.

original: gang gi phyir yul tha dad par byed pa yin na ni shes pa la yul gyis bskyed pa'i 'dra ba nyid nye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir yul tha dad par byed pa yin na ni shes pa la yul gyis bskyed pa'i 'dra ba nyid nye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were to make the object different, then the similarity produced by the object in cognition would be the specific cause.

original: gal te dbang po la sogs pas byas pa'i bye brag bye brag tu byed pa po yin pa de lta na /
analyzed: gal te dbang po la sogs pas byas pa'i bye brag bye brag tu byed pa po yin pa de lta na /
translated: If the specific action of the sense faculties and so on is the agent,

original: 'o na ni dong yis byas pa'i nyams su myong ba'i bye brag ste /
analyzed: 'o na ni dong yis byas pa'i nyams su myong ba'i bye brag ste /
translated: then the specific experience produced by the sense faculties would be the experiencer.

original: nyam su myong ba'i khyad par gang las don nges par rtogs pa'i rtogs par 'gyur ba yin gyi don dang 'dra ba las ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: nyam su myong ba'i khyad par gang las don nges par rtogs pa'i rtogs par 'gyur ba yin gyi don dang 'dra ba las ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: The specific experience would be the knower that understands the ascertained object, but it would not be similar to the object.

original: de ltar 'dod na da ni ste de ltar khas blangs pa na yod pa don byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par don dang 'dra ba mi bzod pas khas blangs pa de'i rang bzhin te de kho na ji ltar mi brjod /
analyzed: de ltar 'dod na da ni ste de ltar khas blangs pa na yod pa don byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par don dang 'dra ba mi bzod pas khas blangs pa de'i rang bzhin te de kho na ji ltar mi brjod /
translated: If you accept that, then since you cannot accept that the specific nature of an existent functional thing is similar to the object, why do you not state the nature of that which you accept?

original: yod par tha snyad du bya ba'i yul ni tshad mas rtogs pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
analyzed: yod par tha snyad du bya ba'i yul ni tshad mas rtogs pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
translated: The object of conventional expression is the nature that is realized by valid knowledge.

original: tshad mas rtogs pa yang nges pa la gnas pa'i don bstan par nus pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: tshad mas rtogs pa yang nges pa la gnas pa'i don bstan par nus pa kho na yin te /
translated: And that which is realized by valid knowledge is only able to teach the object that is ascertained.

original: rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa ni sgra'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa ni sgra'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the object of a word is the object of conception.

original: cig shos kyis kyang nyams su myong ba thams cad 'di'o zhes bya bar bstan par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: cig shos kyis kyang nyams su myong ba thams cad 'di'o zhes bya bar bstan par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: And the other cannot demonstrate that all experience is this.

original: dper na nor bu dang lcags la sogs pa'i gzugs rnams mi mkhas pas mthong du zin kyang khyad par brjod par mi nus pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nor bu dang lcags la sogs pa'i gzugs rnams mi mkhas pas mthong du zin kyang khyad par brjod par mi nus pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, even though the forms of jewels, iron, etc., are seen by the unlearned, they cannot express their differences.

original: tshad mas yul du byas pa thams cad kyang 'di'o zhes bstan par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshad mas yul du byas pa thams cad kyang 'di'o zhes bstan par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: And all that is taken as an object by a valid cognition cannot be demonstrated as this.

original: dper na rjes su dpag pa'i mig bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rjes su dpag pa'i mig bzhin no //
translated: For example, like the eye of inference.

original: de'i phyir brgal ba 'di ci zhig yin zhes smras pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir brgal ba 'di ci zhig yin zhes smras pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the statement, ‚ÄúWhat is this argument?‚Äù

original: de ni zhes bya ba don gyis byas pa'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba don gyis byas pa'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: is the nature of a distinction made by the meaning of the word ‚Äúthat.‚Äù

original: 'di'i dngos po ni 'di nyid de mngon sum nyid do //
analyzed: 'di'i dngos po ni 'di nyid de mngon sum nyid do //
translated: This is the very thing of that, namely, perception.

original: de byed par gyur pas mngon sum nyid du rva nas bzung nas bstan par mi nus kyi /
analyzed: de byed par gyur pas mngon sum nyid du rva nas bzung nas bstan par mi nus kyi /
translated: Since it is the producer, it is not possible to demonstrate perception by taking the horn as the basis.

original: don nges par @133b rtogs pa'i rtogs pa mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: don nges par @133b rtogs pa'i rtogs pa mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: Because the understanding that ascertains the object is seen.

original: de'i rgyu mtshan du gyur pa don gyis byas pa'i nyams su myong ba'i khyad par yod do zhes ni smra bar nus pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rgyu mtshan du gyur pa don gyis byas pa'i nyams su myong ba'i khyad par yod do zhes ni smra bar nus pa yin no zhe na /
translated: The reason for that is that there is a difference in the experience that is produced by the object.

original: cig shos kyis smras pa /üîΩrigs pa smra ba 'di rtogs pa med pa mtshon pa med pa 'di'o zhes nges pa med pas dngos po ste shes pa'i rang bzhin rnam par 'jog par byed pa ste /
analyzed: cig shos kyis smras pa / rigs pa smra ba 'di rtogs pa med pa mtshon pa med pa 'di'o zhes nges pa med pas dngos po ste shes pa'i rang bzhin rnam par 'jog par byed pa ste /
translated: The other says:üîΩThis proponent of reason is not understood, and this is not indicated, so it is not ascertained.

original: nges pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs par byed po'i zhes bya ba'i don ni gzhan gyi 'di ni mi srid do zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs par byed po'i zhes bya ba'i don ni gzhan gyi 'di ni mi srid do zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthe nature of a thing, i.e., consciousness, is posited by the one who understands it‚Äù is that this is impossible for the other.

original: ji ltar rnam par 'jog ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam par 'jog ce na /
translated: How is it posited?

original: bshad pa myong ba'i rang bzhin 'di ni sngon po 'di yin gyi gzhan ser po'i ni ma yin no zhes bya bar te /
analyzed: bshad pa myong ba'i rang bzhin 'di ni sngon po 'di yin gyi gzhan ser po'i ni ma yin no zhes bya bar te /
translated: The explanation is that this nature of experience is of this blue, not of that yellow.

original: de'i phyir legs par rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir legs par rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is well posited.

original: 'di ni bsting tshig ste gzhan gyis bzhag pa 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bsting tshig ste gzhan gyis bzhag pa 'gog pa'o //
translated: This is a joke, refuting the positing of the other.

original: 'di'o zhes bya bar nges par rtogs pa med kyi mig la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi bye brag rnam par 'jog pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'di'o zhes bya bar nges par rtogs pa med kyi mig la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi bye brag rnam par 'jog pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But is it not the case that the eye, etc. are posited as having the nature of a specific particular?

original: bden te / de las ni nges par rtogs pa'i rang bzhin mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'bras bu rnam par 'jog pa yod pas 'di dbang gis mig la sogs pa nges par rtogs pa med pa'i rang bzhin yang rnam par gzhag pa yin na /
analyzed: bden te / de las ni nges par rtogs pa'i rang bzhin mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'bras bu rnam par 'jog pa yod pas 'di dbang gis mig la sogs pa nges par rtogs pa med pa'i rang bzhin yang rnam par gzhag pa yin na /
translated: That is true, but the eye, etc. are posited as having the nature of a specific particular by the result, the eye consciousness, etc. which is ascertained by that.

original: rnam par shes pa ni nges par rtogs pa'i rang bzhin gzhan gyis rnam par gzhag pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni nges par rtogs pa'i rang bzhin gzhan gyis rnam par gzhag pa ma yin gyi /
translated: But consciousness is not posited as having the nature of a specific particular by another.

original: 'on kyang bdag nyid kho nas yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang bdag nyid kho nas yin no //
translated: Rather, it is by itself.

original: de'i phyir de nges par ma rtogs na ni rtogs pa nges par rnam par gzhag pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de nges par ma rtogs na ni rtogs pa nges par rnam par gzhag pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, if it is not ascertained, the ascertainment of the positing of the particular is not possible.

original: nor bu dang dngul la sogs pa bye brag tu rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu nges par ma zin pa gang yin pa de dag kyang bye brag med pa'i tha snyad du bya'o //
analyzed: nor bu dang dngul la sogs pa bye brag tu rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu nges par ma zin pa gang yin pa de dag kyang bye brag med pa'i tha snyad du bya'o //
translated: and the cause of the particular arrangement of jewels, silver, and so on, is not ascertained, then they should be designated without distinction.

original: 'di skad du 'bras bu bye brag tu rtogs pa mthong ba'i phyir bye brag tu rnam par 'jog go zhes ni brjod par mi nus te /
analyzed: 'di skad du 'bras bu bye brag tu rtogs pa mthong ba'i phyir bye brag tu rnam par 'jog go zhes ni brjod par mi nus te /
translated: One cannot say that the particular arrangement is due to the perception of a particular effect,

original: sngon po la sogs pa'i don gyis byas pa'i myong ba'i bye brag nges pa yin na ni sngon po rtogs pa'i nges par yongs su bcad par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa'i don gyis byas pa'i myong ba'i bye brag nges pa yin na ni sngon po rtogs pa'i nges par yongs su bcad par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: because if the particular experience produced by the object such as blue is ascertained, then the ascertainment of the perception of blue would be established.

original: don nges par rtogs par yongs su gnod pa ni don gyis byas pa'i khyad par yongs su gcod pa nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don nges par rtogs par yongs su gnod pa ni don gyis byas pa'i khyad par yongs su gcod pa nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the ascertainment of the perception of the object is the ascertainment of the particular produced by the object, and not anything else.

original: gang gi rang bzhin nges pa nyid shes pa'i las la nges par 'gyur pa na de ma nges na de'i bdag nyid las la nges pa'i rtogs pa ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gi rang bzhin nges pa nyid shes pa'i las la nges par 'gyur pa na de ma nges na de'i bdag nyid las la nges pa'i rtogs pa ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: When the nature of the object is ascertained, then the action is ascertained. If it is not ascertained, how can there be the ascertainment of the action that has it as its nature?

original: de'i phyir bye brag gi rtogs pa mthong ba'i phyir bye brag rnam par 'jog go zhes gang smras pa de la don 'dir 'gyur te /üîΩbye brag rtogs pa'i @134a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir bye brag gi rtogs pa mthong ba'i phyir bye brag rnam par 'jog go zhes gang smras pa de la don 'dir 'gyur te / bye brag rtogs pa'i @134a * //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the statement ‚ÄúThe particulars are posited because the realization of the particulars is seen‚Äù is this:

original: phyir bye brag rtogs so zhes bya ba yin na de ltar ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyir bye brag rtogs so zhes bya ba yin na de ltar ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: If it is said, ‚ÄúThe particulars are posited because the realization of the particulars is seen,‚Äù that is not logical.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bdag nyid nges par rtogs pa med pa zhes gsungs te /üîΩgang gi bdag nyid du dngos po la nges par rtogs par bya ba de nyid nges par rtogs pa med pa zhes bya bar ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bdag nyid nges par rtogs pa med pa zhes gsungs te / gang gi bdag nyid du dngos po la nges par rtogs par bya ba de nyid nges par rtogs pa med pa zhes bya bar ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: For that reason, it is said that ‚Äúthere is no realization of its own nature.‚ÄùüîΩHow could it be that the very nature of the thing to be realized is not realized?

original: de nges par ma rtogs na yang dngos po de'i rang bzhin ci 'dra ba zhig tu rnam par 'jog / rang bzhin gang zhig ma rtogs na ni dngos po de'i rang bzhin du rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nges par ma rtogs na yang dngos po de'i rang bzhin ci 'dra ba zhig tu rnam par 'jog / rang bzhin gang zhig ma rtogs na ni dngos po de'i rang bzhin du rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If that is not realized, how could the nature of that thing be posited? If the nature is not realized, that thing is not realized to have that nature.

original: dper na skad cig ma nyid nges par ma rtogs par sngon po la sogs pa de'i rang bzhin du nges pa mi rtogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na skad cig ma nyid nges par ma rtogs par sngon po la sogs pa de'i rang bzhin du nges pa mi rtogs pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, without ascertaining momentariness, one does not ascertain the nature of blue, etc.

original: shes pa'i don gyis byas pa'i bye brag kyang nges par rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: shes pa'i don gyis byas pa'i bye brag kyang nges par rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: Nor is the distinction made by the object of consciousness ascertained,

original: des na shes pa de'i rang bzhin du nges par rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: des na shes pa de'i rang bzhin du nges par rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: because one does not ascertain the nature of that consciousness.

original: don nges par rtogs pa'i rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don nges par rtogs pa'i rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is not a conception that ascertains the object.

original: dngos po 'di rang bzhin du rtogs pa ni rang bzhin rtogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba can yin te /
analyzed: dngos po 'di rang bzhin du rtogs pa ni rang bzhin rtogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba can yin te /
translated: The ascertainment of this thing as the nature is preceded by the ascertainment of the nature,

original: 'di ltar 'ga' zhig la ltos pas rang bzhin 'ga' zhig brtags pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'ga' zhig la ltos pas rang bzhin 'ga' zhig brtags pa yin la /
translated: because the nature is imagined in dependence on something,

original: dngos po yang ldog pa gzhan las brtags pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po yang ldog pa gzhan las brtags pa yin no //
translated: and the thing is imagined in dependence on another exclusion.

original: de la ldog pa gzhan dang ldan pa'i ldog pa gzhan gyi rtogs pa khyad par du gyur pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa gang yin pa 'di la ni de'i rtogs pa'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa gang yin pa 'di la ni de'i rtogs pasüîΩkhyab pa yin te /
analyzed: de la ldog pa gzhan dang ldan pa'i ldog pa gzhan gyi rtogs pa khyad par du gyur pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa gang yin pa 'di la ni de'i rtogs pa'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa gang yin pa 'di la ni de'i rtogs pas khyab pa yin te /
translated: The realization of the nature that is the one part of the realization of the one that possesses another aspect is pervaded by the realization of that one.

original: dper na dbyig pa rtog pa'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa dbyig pa can rtogs pa ni dbyig pa rtogs pas khyab pa yin pa bzhin yin pas na khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: dper na dbyig pa rtog pa'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa dbyig pa can rtogs pa ni dbyig pa rtogs pas khyab pa yin pa bzhin yin pas na khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: For example, the realization of the one that possesses a stick, which is the one part of the realization of a stick, is pervaded by the realization of the stick.

original: 'dra ba yang rtogs pa med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'dra ba yang rtogs pa med pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the similar also not realized?

original: gzung ba'i rnam pa nyams su myong ba'i phyir ma rtogs pas so zhes ci'i phyir brjod ce na /
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam pa nyams su myong ba'i phyir ma rtogs pas so zhes ci'i phyir brjod ce na /
translated: Why is it said that it is not realized because the aspect of the object is not experienced?

original: bden te / nyams su myong yang 'dra ba'i bdag nyid du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bden te / nyams su myong yang 'dra ba'i bdag nyid du ni ma yin te /
translated: It is true, but it is not experienced as having a similar nature.

original: gang gi phyir nyams su myong ba ni rtogs kyis 'di ni 'dra ba'i zhes zhen pa med kyi 'on kyang don yin no zhes so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nyams su myong ba ni rtogs kyis 'di ni 'dra ba'i zhes zhen pa med kyi 'on kyang don yin no zhes so //
translated: Because experience is understood, and there is no fixation on this as ‚Äúsimilar to that,‚Äù but rather ‚Äúit is an object.‚Äù

original: de lta na 'o na ni rjes su dpag pas 'dra ba'i bdag nyid du nges par byed de /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na ni rjes su dpag pas 'dra ba'i bdag nyid du nges par byed de /
translated: If that is so, then inference ascertains the nature of similarity.

original: rang bzhin ni gsal ba nyid du mngon sum du gyur pas ma rtogs pa ma yin pa de'i phyir de ni sgrub par byed par 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni gsal ba nyid du mngon sum du gyur pas ma rtogs pa ma yin pa de'i phyir de ni sgrub par byed par 'thad pa yin no //
translated: Since the nature is manifest as clarity, it is not unperceived, therefore it is tenable that it is established.

original: gang gi phyir 'dra ba las gzhan don dang 'brel par byed pa ma yin pa de'i phyir gzhal bya rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dra ba las gzhan don dang 'brel par byed pa ma yin pa de'i phyir gzhal bya rtogs pa ste /
translated: Because it does not relate to an object that is different from similarity, therefore it is the establishment of the realization of the object to be comprehended.

original: gzhal bya rtogs par rnam par gzhal ba'i sgrub byed de byed pa ni gzhal @134b bya'i rang bzhin lta bu gang yin pa de'i dngos po ni gzhal bya'i rang bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: gzhal bya rtogs par rnam par gzhal ba'i sgrub byed de byed pa ni gzhal @134b bya'i rang bzhin lta bu gang yin pa de'i dngos po ni gzhal bya'i rang bzhin nyid de /
translated: The establishment of the realization of the object to be comprehended is the establishment of the means of knowledge. That which is like the nature of the object to be comprehended is its nature.

original: rnam par shes pa'i gzhal bya dang 'dra ba nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i gzhal bya dang 'dra ba nyid do //
translated: It is similar to the object to be comprehended by consciousness.

original: sgrub byed 'dra ba las gzhan shes pa las phyi rol du gyur pa 'am /
analyzed: sgrub byed 'dra ba las gzhan shes pa las phyi rol du gyur pa 'am /
translated: But if it is different from the cognition, or if it is external to cognition, or if it is by nature external to cognition, and if it is the object of the sense faculties, etc., then the definite connection between that cognition and its object cannot be established.

original: rang bzhin du gyur kyang dbang po la sogs pas bya ba yin na ni shes pa de'i las dang 'brel pa nges pa 'di no sngon po myong ba yin gyi ser po ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta bur gyur pa mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin du gyur kyang dbang po la sogs pas bya ba yin na ni shes pa de'i las dang 'brel pa nges pa 'di no sngon po myong ba yin gyi ser po ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta bur gyur pa mi 'grub ste /
translated: It is not established in the form ‚ÄúThis is the experience of blue, not yellow.‚Äù

original: rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not understood.

original: gal te sgrub par byed pa don dang 'dra ba de nyid kyang 'bras bu las gzhan du 'gyur go zhe na /
analyzed: gal te sgrub par byed pa don dang 'dra ba de nyid kyang 'bras bu las gzhan du 'gyur go zhe na /
translated: If the proof is similar to the object, then it too would be different from the effect.

original: bshad pa gzhal bya'i rang bzhin de yang shes pa de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa gzhal bya'i rang bzhin de yang shes pa de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa yin no //
translated: We reply: That object, which is the nature of the object of cognition, is the very nature of that cognition.

original: gang gi phyir bdag nyid yin pa des na 'bras bu tshad ma las gzhan tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bdag nyid yin pa des na 'bras bu tshad ma las gzhan tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: Since it is the very nature of the cognition, the effect is not different from the valid knowledge.

original: byed pa thams cad ni byed pa po'i gzhan gyi dbang dang rang gi bya ba dang ldan pa dang / gtser gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la nye bar sbyor bar mthong ste /
analyzed: byed pa thams cad ni byed pa po'i gzhan gyi dbang dang rang gi bya ba dang ldan pa dang / gtser gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la nye bar sbyor bar mthong ste /
translated: All activity is seen to be dependent on the other, the agent, and to be connected with the activity of the agent and the principal object to be accomplished.

original: dper na shing skyes bus byin gyis brlabs shing 'bar ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa tshogs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la nye bar sbyor ba mthong ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na shing skyes bus byin gyis brlabs shing 'bar ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa tshogs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la nye bar sbyor ba mthong ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is seen that a tree, which is empowered by a person, is connected with the activity of burning and the principal object to be accomplished.

original: 'dra ba ni byed pa po'i gzhan gyi dbang dang bya ba dang ldan pa dang / gtsor gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la nye bar sbyor bar ma mthong zhing /
analyzed: 'dra ba ni byed pa po'i gzhan gyi dbang dang bya ba dang ldan pa dang / gtsor gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la nye bar sbyor bar ma mthong zhing /
translated: Similarity is not seen to be dependent on the other, the agent, and to be connected with the activity of the agent and the principal object to be accomplished.

original: byed pa po 'ga' zhig kyang mthong ba med pas de ji ltar na don dang 'dra bar byed par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: byed pa po 'ga' zhig kyang mthong ba med pas de ji ltar na don dang 'dra bar byed par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: And since no agent is seen, how can it be similar to the object?

original: smras pa / cung zad kyang phongs pas byed pas rtog pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang 'di dngos po la gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: smras pa / cung zad kyang phongs pas byed pas rtog pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang 'di dngos po la gnas pa yin te /
translated: We reply: It is not imagined because it is not deficient in the least. But it is based on things.

original: byed pa 'ga' zhig la ma brten par ni bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa 'ga' zhig la ma brten par ni bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because without depending on some activity, the object to be established is not established.

original: 'di tsam zhig ni khyad par yin te /
analyzed: 'di tsam zhig ni khyad par yin te /
translated: This much is the difference:

original: byed pa 'ga' zhig ni rang las nges pa yin te /
analyzed: byed pa 'ga' zhig ni rang las nges pa yin te /
translated: some activity is determined from itself,

original: dper na gcod pa la ste'u bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gcod pa la ste'u bzhin no //
translated: like a hatchet in cutting.

original: gzhan la ni bsgrub par bya ba dang ldan pa'i byed pa po mthong ba las byed pa po rnam par 'jog pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la ni bsgrub par bya ba dang ldan pa'i byed pa po mthong ba las byed pa po rnam par 'jog pa yin no //
translated: In other cases, the agent is posited from seeing the activity that possesses the object to be established.

original: byed pa med par ni bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa med par ni bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not tenable that the object to be established is accomplished without activity.

original: 'dir don dam par ni byed pa po 'ga' yang yod pa ma /
analyzed: 'dir don dam par ni byed pa po 'ga' yang yod pa ma /
translated: Here, ultimately, no agent exists at all,

original: yin gyi 'on kyang tha snyad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: yin gyi 'on kyang tha snyad pa kho na'o //
translated: but rather, it is only conventionally.

original: byed pa yang tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yin gyi 'dir skyed pa por 'dod pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: byed pa yang tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yin gyi 'dir skyed pa por 'dod pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: And activity is the reason for convention, but here it is not asserted to be the producer.

original: de la shes pa'i 'dzin pa'i rnam pa gzung ba'i rnam pa las tha dad par bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gzhig gyur pa dga' ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'dzin pa la ni ngas mthong ngo zhes @135a * //
analyzed: de la shes pa'i 'dzin pa'i rnam pa gzung ba'i rnam pa las tha dad par bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gzhig gyur pa dga' ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'dzin pa la ni ngas mthong ngo zhes @135a * //
translated: In this regard, the object of the apprehension of the self is the apprehender, which is different from the apprehended aspect, and is the basis of such things as joy.

original: byed pa por zhen pa yin zhing /
analyzed: byed pa por zhen pa yin zhing /
translated: When one conceives of it as the agent, one says, ‚ÄúI see.‚Äù

original: de yang don rtogs pa'i rang bzhin du zhen pa na bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin du zhen par 'gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang don rtogs pa'i rang bzhin du zhen pa na bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin du zhen par 'gyur pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, when one conceives of it as the nature of the realization of the object, one conceives of it as the nature of the object to be accomplished.

original: des na bsgrub par bya ba dang ldan pa'i byed pa po de'i bsgrub par bya ba'i bye brag 'di'i rgyu byed pa 'ga' zhig tu 'gyur dgos la de yang tha snyad par brtag pa'i ni mi 'thad do //
analyzed: des na bsgrub par bya ba dang ldan pa'i byed pa po de'i bsgrub par bya ba'i bye brag 'di'i rgyu byed pa 'ga' zhig tu 'gyur dgos la de yang tha snyad par brtag pa'i ni mi 'thad do //
translated: Therefore, the agent who possesses the object to be accomplished must be the cause of some particular object to be accomplished, but that is not tenable in the context of the analysis of conventional expressions.

original: gang gi phyir khyad par dang ldan pa ma yin rang bzhin gyi nyams su myong ba na khyad par can gyi don rtogs par rnam par gzhag pa ni rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa de'i phyir rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bye
analyzed: gang gi phyir khyad par dang ldan pa ma yin rang bzhin gyi nyams su myong ba na khyad par can gyi don rtogs par rnam par gzhag pa ni rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa de'i phyir rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bye
translated: Because it is illogical to posit that when one experiences a nature that is not qualified, one understands a qualified object, therefore the cause of the positing must be a difference that is experienced, which has the nature of consciousness.

original: brag nyams su myong bar gyur pa ni byed par 'gyur dgos so //
analyzed: brag nyams su myong bar gyur pa ni byed par 'gyur dgos so //
translated: That activity must be the case.

original: 'dir byed pa de shes pa las tha dad pa med pa nyid ni byed pa po'i dbang du gyur pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'dir byed pa de shes pa las tha dad pa med pa nyid ni byed pa po'i dbang du gyur pa nyid yin la /
translated: Here, that activity is not different from consciousness itself, and it is the case that it is under the power of the agent.

original: nyams su myong bar gyur pa nyid kyang bya ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nyams su myong bar gyur pa nyid kyang bya ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Also, the experience itself is said to be the activity, and it is not anything else.

original: gang zhig byed par 'gyur pa 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par can gyi rang bzhin ni nyams su myong ba med pa des na /
analyzed: gang zhig byed par 'gyur pa 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par can gyi rang bzhin ni nyams su myong ba med pa des na /
translated: That which is the nature of the apprehension of the aspect of the activity is not experienced.

original: gal te gzung ba'i rnam pa ngar 'dzin pas las phyi rol dang bde ba'i rnam pa dang bral ba mi shes pa'i bdag nyid du zhen pa de lta na yang gzhan du mi 'thad pas na rjes su dpag pa las shes pa'i ngo bo de dang 'dra ba'iüîΩrang bzhin du bzhag pa yin gyi mngon sum las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te gzung ba'i rnam pa ngar 'dzin pas las phyi rol dang bde ba'i rnam pa dang bral ba mi shes pa'i bdag nyid du zhen pa de lta na yang gzhan du mi 'thad pas na rjes su dpag pa las shes pa'i ngo bo de dang 'dra ba'i rang bzhin du bzhag pa yin gyi mngon sum las ni ma yin no //
translated: If the aspect of the object is conceived to be the self that is the agent of external action, and is devoid of the aspect of pleasure, then it is not consciousness.üîΩBut since it is not tenable that it is something other than consciousness, it is posited as having the nature of consciousness that is similar to that consciousness that is known through inference, but not through direct perception.

original: gzung ba'i rnam pa 'dra ba'i bdag nyid can shes pa'i rang bzhin du mngon sum gyis ni nges pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam pa 'dra ba'i bdag nyid can shes pa'i rang bzhin du mngon sum gyis ni nges pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Direct perception does not ascertain the nature of consciousness to be the identity of the aspect of the object.

original: 'on kyang don gyi khyad par rtogs pa gzhan du nu 'thad pas rjes su dpag pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang don gyi khyad par rtogs pa gzhan du nu 'thad pas rjes su dpag pa yin no //
translated: However, it is an inference because it is tenable that it is the realization of a specific object.

original: rig bzhin pa'i 'dra ba de yang shes pa las tha mi dad pa yin na shes pa don nges pa 'dzin par 'jog par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rig bzhin pa'i 'dra ba de yang shes pa las tha mi dad pa yin na shes pa don nges pa 'dzin par 'jog par byed pa yin no //
translated: If that similarity that is known is not different from consciousness, then it is posited as the apprehender of the ascertainment of the object.

original: de'i phyir 'dir rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis byed pa nyid du shes pa'i byed pa ni med kyi 'on kyang byed pa po'i bya ba'i khyad par can mthong ba las rjes su dpag pa yin zhing de las kyang gtsor gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la 'di'iüîΩbya ba rjes su dpag pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis byed pa nyid du shes pa'i byed pa ni med kyi 'on kyang byed pa po'i bya ba'i khyad par can mthong ba las rjes su dpag pa yin zhing de las kyang gtsor gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la 'di'i bya ba rjes su dpag pa yin no //
translated: And from that, the activity of this agent is inferred with regard to the principal object to be established.

original: byed pa po'i bdag nyid kyang shes pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir dang / shes pa'i bdag nyid du nyams su myong ba'i bya ba ldan pa zhes bya ba yang rjes su dpag par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: byed pa po'i bdag nyid kyang shes pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir dang / shes pa'i bdag nyid du nyams su myong ba'i bya ba ldan pa zhes bya ba yang rjes su dpag par bya ba yin te /
translated: The nature of the agent is also the nature of consciousness, and the activity that is experienced as the nature of consciousness is also to be inferred.

original: mngon sum gyis ni gzung ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bor nges pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ni gzung ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bor nges pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not ascertained as the nature of the consciousness that is apprehended by direct perception.

original: bye brag tu @135b rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu ni de'i bdag nyid du nyams su myong ba yin gyi gzhan gyi rang bzhin du ni ma yin pas na de ci'i phyir gang gi phyir sgrub par byed pa nyid du ma mthong ba 'di ji ltar sgrub par byedüîΩpa yin zhes brjod /
analyzed: bye brag tu @135b rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu ni de'i bdag nyid du nyams su myong ba yin gyi gzhan gyi rang bzhin du ni ma yin pas na de ci'i phyir gang gi phyir sgrub par byed pa nyid du ma mthong ba 'di ji ltar sgrub par byed pa yin zhes brjod /
translated: In particular, the cause of positing the self is the experience of its nature, but not the nature of something else. Therefore, why would you say, ‚ÄúWhy is this not seen as the means of establishment?‚Äù

original: byed pa po'i bya ba mthong ba'i phyir na 'di nyid gtsor gyur ba'i sgrub par bya ba'i yan lag tu rjes su dpag pa yin la /
analyzed: byed pa po'i bya ba mthong ba'i phyir na 'di nyid gtsor gyur ba'i sgrub par bya ba'i yan lag tu rjes su dpag pa yin la /
translated: Since the activity of the agent is seen, this is the primary factor to be established.

original: byed pa po'i rang bzhin nyid kyang byed pa po'i gzhan gyi dbang dang / de'i bdag nyid du nyams su myong ba yang bya ba dang ldan pa yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: byed pa po'i rang bzhin nyid kyang byed pa po'i gzhan gyi dbang dang / de'i bdag nyid du nyams su myong ba yang bya ba dang ldan pa yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that the nature of the agent is the power of the agent and that the experience of its nature is the activity of the agent, it is said:

original: de yi bdag nyid 'dzin de ni //
analyzed: de yi bdag nyid 'dzin de ni //
translated: The apprehension of its nature

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: is the agent.

original: don dang 'dra ba nyid 'dzin pa'i shes pa byed pa por 'gyur pa de'o //
analyzed: don dang 'dra ba nyid 'dzin pa'i shes pa byed pa por 'gyur pa de'o //
translated: The cognition that apprehends what is similar to the object becomes the agent.

original: 'dis ni bya ba dang ldan pa dang byed pa po'i dbang du gyur pa brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni bya ba dang ldan pa dang byed pa po'i dbang du gyur pa brjod pa yin no //
translated: This states that the agent is dependent on the action.

original: nges pa'i don rtogs pa de nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi bya ba gang yin pa'i bya ba des bya ba dang bcas par gtsor gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba dang ldan par snang ngo //
analyzed: nges pa'i don rtogs pa de nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi bya ba gang yin pa'i bya ba des bya ba dang bcas par gtsor gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba dang ldan par snang ngo //
translated: The action that is the nature of the realization of the definitive meaning is the action that is the primary factor endowed with the object to be accomplished.

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: gang gi phyir 'dra ba'i dbang gis byed pa po shes pa'i don nges par 'dzin pa bzhin du snang ba de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dra ba'i dbang gis byed pa po shes pa'i don nges par 'dzin pa bzhin du snang ba de'i phyir /
translated: Because the agent is perceived as if it were ascertained by the meaning of the cognition of similarity,

original: de byed pa por shes pa yin gyi mngon sum gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de byed pa por shes pa yin gyi mngon sum gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: it is known as the agent, but not by direct perception.

original: rang gi las te yul zhes bya ba'i las la'o //
analyzed: rang gi las te yul zhes bya ba'i las la'o //
translated: With respect to its object, which is called the object.

original: de lta bu'i sgra sbyar ba ni chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sgra sbyar ba ni chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The application of such terms is because all phenomena are devoid of action.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang byed pa dag tha dad pa med na 'dra ba byed pa nyid ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang byed pa dag tha dad pa med na 'dra ba byed pa nyid ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: If the object to be accomplished and the agent are not different, how can there be the action of similarity?

original: de'i zhes smos te 'dra ba'i dbang gis te nyams su myong bas so //
analyzed: de'i zhes smos te 'dra ba'i dbang gis te nyams su myong bas so //
translated: The word ‚Äúits‚Äù refers to the likeness, which is experienced by the cognition.

original: gang gi phyir shes pa la gnas pa'i 'dra ba myong ba de'i phyir shes pa de sngon po'i don rtogs par nges pa yin nam de'i phyir 'dra ba'i ni rnam par 'jog par byed pa ni byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir shes pa la gnas pa'i 'dra ba myong ba de'i phyir shes pa de sngon po'i don rtogs par nges pa yin nam de'i phyir 'dra ba'i ni rnam par 'jog par byed pa ni byed pa yin no //
translated: Since the likeness is experienced by the cognition, therefore, that cognition is ascertained as the cognition of the object blue. Thus, the likeness is the cause of the determination.

original: nges pa'i shes pas rnam par gzhag pa na yang shes pa de nyid 'bras bu yin pa de'i phyir rtogs pa'i cha ni 'bras bu yin la /
analyzed: nges pa'i shes pas rnam par gzhag pa na yang shes pa de nyid 'bras bu yin pa de'i phyir rtogs pa'i cha ni 'bras bu yin la /
translated: Even when the determination is made by a ascertaining cognition, that cognition is the result. Therefore, the part that is the cognition is the result.

original: 'dra ba'i cha ni sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dra ba'i cha ni sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: The part that is the likeness is the cause.

original: snga na med pa'i dpon brjod pa'i phyir bar skabs par ma dor 'phros pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: snga na med pa'i dpon brjod pa'i phyir bar skabs par ma dor 'phros pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: The verse in the middle is a digression, because it introduces a new topic.

original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan sgrub par byed pa gzhan med par brjod pas so //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan sgrub par byed pa gzhan med par brjod pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy this‚Äù refers to the reason for the connection, because it states that there is no other cause.

original: dbang po dang phrad pa dang don la lta ba dang khyad par gyi shes pa de rnams tshad ma yin pa spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang po dang phrad pa dang don la lta ba dang khyad par gyi shes pa de rnams tshad ma yin pa spangs pa yin no //
translated: The sense faculty, the object, the seeing of the object, and the specific cognition are excluded from being valid cognitions.

original: de las te dbang po la sogs pa de dag las shes pa'i sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i nges pa'i las dang 'brel pa myong ba @136a * //
analyzed: de las te dbang po la sogs pa de dag las shes pa'i sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i nges pa'i las dang 'brel pa myong ba @136a * //
translated: From those, i.e., from the sense faculty and so on, the experience that is related to the activity of ascertaining blue, yellow, and so on is not established to be of that nature,

original: 'di ni sngon po nyid kyi yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin de mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: 'di ni sngon po nyid kyi yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin de mi 'grub ste /
translated: which is like ‚ÄúThis is the nature of blue.‚Äù

original: rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not stable.

original: des na gang gi phyir de dag las nges pa dang 'brel pa'i rgyu ma yin pa de'i phyir tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: des na gang gi phyir de dag las nges pa dang 'brel pa'i rgyu ma yin pa de'i phyir tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because they are not the cause of the related ascertainment, they are not valid cognitions.

original: don 'dir sngar de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'di'i nang du brjod zin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: don 'dir sngar de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'di'i nang du brjod zin pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt this point already expressed in the earlier statement, ‚ÄúIt is not of the nature of that‚Äù?

original: yang ci'i phyir 'dis dbang po la sogs pa brjod /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir 'dis dbang po la sogs pa brjod /
translated: Why does this text mention the sense faculties and so on?

original: smras pa / sngar ni dbang po la sogs pa tha dad pa'i byed brag don thams cad kyi thun mong ba nyid yin nam ma yin yang rung ste /
analyzed: smras pa / sngar ni dbang po la sogs pa tha dad pa'i byed brag don thams cad kyi thun mong ba nyid yin nam ma yin yang rung ste /
translated: Objection: Previously, it was said that if the distinctions of the sense faculties and so on are not shared in common by all objects,

original: shes pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa ma yin na mi shes pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir byed pa ma yin pa des na bdag nyid du gyur pa kho na byed pa yin par 'gyur zhes brjod la /
analyzed: shes pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa ma yin na mi shes pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir byed pa ma yin pa des na bdag nyid du gyur pa kho na byed pa yin par 'gyur zhes brjod la /
translated: then they are not the nature of consciousness and therefore they are not agents. Thus it was said that only that which is the nature of consciousness is an agent.

original: da ltar ni gal te dbang po thun mong ba nyid dang / khyad par dang khyad par can gyi shes pa dag kyang bye brag tu mi 'grub pa dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i nyes pa gzhan du yang mi 'gyur na ni tha dad pa yang ji zhig ltar byed par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba yin pa'i phyir zlos
analyzed: da ltar ni gal te dbang po thun mong ba nyid dang / khyad par dang khyad par can gyi shes pa dag kyang bye brag tu mi 'grub pa dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i nyes pa gzhan du yang mi 'gyur na ni tha dad pa yang ji zhig ltar byed par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba yin pa'i phyir zlos
translated: Now, if it is not the case that the sense faculties are shared in common, and if the consciousnesses that are distinguished as specific and general are not established as distinct, and if the other faults explained previously do not occur, then how could that which is distinct be an agent?

original: pa ma yin no //
analyzed: pa ma yin no //
translated: Reply: This is not a repetition.

original: 'di dag skyed par byed pa yin na ji ltar rnam par 'jog pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di dag skyed par byed pa yin na ji ltar rnam par 'jog pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: If they are agents, how could they not be posited as distinct?

original: 'bras bur gyur pa skyed par nus na rnam par 'jog pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: 'bras bur gyur pa skyed par nus na rnam par 'jog pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
translated: If it is able to generate the result, it is not posited as a valid cognition.

original: bar du ma chod pa ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya bas gtan tshigs brjod do //
analyzed: bar du ma chod pa ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya bas gtan tshigs brjod do //
translated: Why is this? He states the reason: ‚Äúbecause it is not unobscured.‚Äù

original: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: gang gi phyir don rtogs pa rnam par gzhag pa ni skyed par byed pa 'di dag las rnam par 'jog pa po gzhan la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir don rtogs pa rnam par gzhag pa ni skyed par byed pa 'di dag las rnam par 'jog pa po gzhan la ltos pa yin no //
translated: Because the ascertainment of the object to be understood is dependent on another‚Äîthe one who posits it‚Äî

original: des na ltos par byed pa gzhan des 'di dag bar du gcod pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: des na ltos par byed pa gzhan des 'di dag bar du gcod pa de'i phyir /
translated: and because that other, which is the basis of dependence, is obscured by that,

original: de'i ltos par bya ba gang yin pa de nyid rnam par 'jog pa po yin gyi 'di dag ni ma yin pa des na tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i ltos par bya ba gang yin pa de nyid rnam par 'jog pa po yin gyi 'di dag ni ma yin pa des na tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: then that which is the basis of dependence is the one who posits it, but these are not. Therefore they are not valid cognitions.

original: 'di snyam du bar du chod pa yin du chug pa de lta na yang ji ltar tshad mas ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du bar du chod pa yin du chug pa de lta na yang ji ltar tshad mas ma yin zhe na /
translated: One might think, ‚ÄúEven if it is obscured, how is it not a valid cognition?‚Äù

original: bshad pa / byed pa po khyad par du 'phags pa khyad par can de mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / byed pa po khyad par du 'phags pa khyad par can de mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In response, it is said: Because the superior, special agent is not established.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: byed pa po thams cad ni tshad ma ma yin gyi /
analyzed: byed pa po thams cad ni tshad ma ma yin gyi /
translated: All agents are not valid cognitions.

original: 'on kyang khyad par du 'phags pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on kyang khyad par du 'phags pa yin na /
translated: But if they are superior,

original: 'di dag ni ltos par bya ba gzhan gyis bar chod pas byed pa po gzhan las cung zad kyang khyad par du gyur pa ma yin pas de ji ltar tshad mar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di dag ni ltos par bya ba gzhan gyis bar chod pas byed pa po gzhan las cung zad kyang khyad par du gyur pa ma yin pas de ji ltar tshad mar 'gyur /
translated: then since these are obstructed by other things that are dependent, they are not in the least superior to other agents. Therefore how could they be valid cognitions?

original: tshad mas ni sgrub par byed pa yin la 'di dag kyang sgrub par byed pa nyid @136b yin pa de'i phyir khyad par du 'phags pas ci zhig bya zhe na /üîΩbshad pa / byed pa po rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya ba la nye bar sbyor yang tha ma'i bye brag tu byed pa po 'di nyid ces bya ba la gang zhig tha dad pas bya ba tha dad par 'gyur ba de ni tha ma'i bye brag tu byed pa por
analyzed: tshad mas ni sgrub par byed pa yin la 'di dag kyang sgrub par byed pa nyid @136b yin pa de'i phyir khyad par du 'phags pas ci zhig bya zhe na / bshad pa / byed pa po rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya ba la nye bar sbyor yang tha ma'i bye brag tu byed pa po 'di nyid ces bya ba la gang zhig tha dad pas bya ba tha dad par 'gyur ba de ni tha ma'i bye brag tu byed pa por
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúValid cognitions are that which establishes, and these are that which establishes, so what is the use of being superior?‚Äù

original: brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: brjod pa yin te /
translated: We say: Although all agents are applied to the object of activity, that which is called the very agent of the final distinction is that which, due to being distinct, has distinct activity. That is called the agent of the final distinction.

original: byed pa po rnams thams cad bye brag tu byed pa po yin yang ltos par bya ba bye brag tu byed pa po gzhan gyis bye brag tu byed pa gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba'i bar du ma chod pa de tha dad pas bsgrub par bya ba thaüîΩdad par 'gyur ba yin la /
analyzed: byed pa po rnams thams cad bye brag tu byed pa po yin yang ltos par bya ba bye brag tu byed pa po gzhan gyis bye brag tu byed pa gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba'i bar du ma chod pa de tha dad pas bsgrub par bya ba tha dad par 'gyur ba yin la /
translated: Although all agents are specific agents, that which is the specific agent of the specific object of reliance is the specific agent that is not obstructed from the object to be established, and that is established by the difference of the object to be established.

original: de yang tha ma'i bye brag tu byed pa po nyid yin pas byed pas brjod do //
analyzed: de yang tha ma'i bye brag tu byed pa po nyid yin pas byed pas brjod do //
translated: And that is the final specific agent, and therefore it is called the agent.

original: de lta bur gyur pa de nyid sgrub par byed pa de dam pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa de nyid sgrub par byed pa de dam pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which is such is the best establishing agent.

original: don 'di yin te /
analyzed: don 'di yin te /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: gal te byed pa po thams cad bye brag tu byed pa po yin yang /üîΩde lta na yang tha ma'i bye brag tu byed pa po gang yin pa de nyid sgrub par byed pa dam pa yin la /
analyzed: gal te byed pa po thams cad bye brag tu byed pa po yin yang / de lta na yang tha ma'i bye brag tu byed pa po gang yin pa de nyid sgrub par byed pa dam pa yin la /
translated: Although all agents are specific agents,üîΩnevertheless, that which is the final specific agent is the best establishing agent.

original: sgrub par byed pa dam pa gang yin pa de ni byed pa yin zhing byed pa yang tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa dam pa gang yin pa de ni byed pa yin zhing byed pa yang tshad ma yin no //
translated: And that which is the best establishing agent is the agent, and the agent is valid cognition.

original: des na dbang po la sogs pa yod kyang yul dang yul la khyad par med na shes pa 'di'i bye brag tu byed pa po gzhan gang yin pa de nyid ni byed pa po yin gyi /
analyzed: des na dbang po la sogs pa yod kyang yul dang yul la khyad par med na shes pa 'di'i bye brag tu byed pa po gzhan gang yin pa de nyid ni byed pa po yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, even though the sense faculties and so on exist, if there is no difference between the object and the object, then that very other which is the specific cause of this consciousness is the agent.

original: bar du chod pa'i dbang po la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bar du chod pa'i dbang po la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But the sense faculties and so on that are obstructed are not.

original: yang ji ltar na tha ma'i bye brag tu byed pa po la ltos na dbang po la sogs pa yod kyang zhes smra zhe na /üîΩbshad pa / gang gi phyir dbang po ni bye brag tu byed pa po ma yin te /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na tha ma'i bye brag tu byed pa po la ltos na dbang po la sogs pa yod kyang zhes smra zhe na / bshad pa / gang gi phyir dbang po ni bye brag tu byed pa po ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, how can it be said that even though the sense faculties and so on exist, they are dependent on the specific cause of the last?

original: de'i phyir tha ma la ltos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha ma la ltos so //
translated: In response, NƒÅgƒÅrjuna explains:üîΩBecause the sense faculties are not the specific cause, therefore they are dependent on the last.

original: sngon po dang ser po la sogs par snang ba'i rnam par shes pa thams cad rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu yin pa'i gtan tshigs kyi phyir dbang po rnams ni bye brag tu byed pa po ma yin no //
analyzed: sngon po dang ser po la sogs par snang ba'i rnam par shes pa thams cad rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu yin pa'i gtan tshigs kyi phyir dbang po rnams ni bye brag tu byed pa po ma yin no //
translated: Because the reason is that all consciousnesses that appear as blue, yellow, and so on are conceptual, the sense faculties are not the specific cause.

original: gang dpyod pa pos khas blangs pa'i don la lta ba yang tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: gang dpyod pa pos khas blangs pa'i don la lta ba yang tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: Also, seeing the object that is accepted by the analyzer is not a valid cognition.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa'i rgyu rnam par rtog pa med pa dang por lta ba'i shes pa ni chad ma yin no zhe'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa'i rgyu rnam par rtog pa med pa dang por lta ba'i shes pa ni chad ma yin no zhe'o //
translated: The first cognition of the view, which is non-conceptual, is not a valid cognition.

original: lta ba'i shas pa la sogs pa thob pa'i shes pa mthar thug pa de dag gi snga ma snga ma ni tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: lta ba'i shas pa la sogs pa thob pa'i shes pa mthar thug pa de dag gi snga ma snga ma ni tshad ma yin la /
translated: The earlier of those final cognitions that obtain the view and so on are valid cognitions.

original: phyi ma phyi ma ni 'bras bu yin no zhe na /
analyzed: phyi ma phyi ma ni 'bras bu yin no zhe na /
translated: The later ones are the results.

original: de yang tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: That is not a valid cognition.

original: de'i rang bzhin lta bu gang yin pa de ma yin na shes ba de'i don la lta ba de nyid mi 'grub pa'i rgyu de'i phyir ro //üîΩgal te 'di ni don sngon po'i lta ba yin na zhes grub na ni de'i tshe de phyis 'byung ba'i khyad @137a * //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin lta bu gang yin pa de ma yin na shes ba de'i don la lta ba de nyid mi 'grub pa'i rgyu de'i phyir ro // gal te 'di ni don sngon po'i lta ba yin na zhes grub na ni de'i tshe de phyis 'byung ba'i khyad @137a * //
translated: If it is not like the nature of that, then the view of the object of that cognition is not established, because of the reason.

original: par gyi rnam par rtog pa la ltos nas tshad mar grub pa yin /
analyzed: par gyi rnam par rtog pa la ltos nas tshad mar grub pa yin /
translated: If it is established that this is the view of the blue object, then at that time it is established as a valid cognition in dependence on the later specific conceptual cognition.

original: gang gi phyir 'dra ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dra ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the absence of similarity,

original: don la lta ba nyid ma grub bo //
analyzed: don la lta ba nyid ma grub bo //
translated: the view of the object is not established.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi shes pa tshad ma ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi shes pa tshad ma ma yin pa'o //
translated: So too, the cognition of the qualifier is not a valid cognition.

original: rigs pa pa dang bye brag pas khyad par gyi shes pa ni tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: rigs pa pa dang bye brag pas khyad par gyi shes pa ni tshad ma yin la /
translated: The NaiyƒÅyika and Vai≈õe·π£ika assert that the cognition of the qualifier is a valid cognition.

original: khyad par can gyi shes pa ni 'bras bu zhes bya bar rtogs te /
analyzed: khyad par can gyi shes pa ni 'bras bu zhes bya bar rtogs te /
translated: They understand the cognition of the qualified to be the result.

original: ji ltar du khyad par ma bzung bar khyad par can gyi blor mi 'gyur ro zhes smras pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar du khyad par ma bzung bar khyad par can gyi blor mi 'gyur ro zhes smras pa yin no //
translated: They say, ‚ÄúHow could there be a cognition of the qualified without apprehending the qualifier?‚Äù

original: yul gyis khyad par du ma byas pa'i khyad par gyi shes pa rnam pa med pa gang yin pa de'i khyad par can 'dzin pa'i shes pa rnam pa med pa las khyad par med pa'i phyir /üîΩ'di ni khyad par can gyi shes pa la /
analyzed: yul gyis khyad par du ma byas pa'i khyad par gyi shes pa rnam pa med pa gang yin pa de'i khyad par can 'dzin pa'i shes pa rnam pa med pa las khyad par med pa'i phyir / 'di ni khyad par can gyi shes pa la /
translated: The cognition of the qualifier that is not differentiated by the object, which is without aspect, is not differentiated from the cognition of the qualified that is without aspect.üîΩTherefore, in the cognition of the qualified,

original: 'di ni khyad par gyi shes pa'o zhes rnam par gzhag pa mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: 'di ni khyad par gyi shes pa'o zhes rnam par gzhag pa mi 'grub ste /
translated: it is not established that there is a distinction, ‚ÄúThis is the cognition of the qualified,‚Äù and ‚ÄúThis is the cognition of the qualifier.‚Äù

original: 'grub pa ma yin pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'grub pa ma yin pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not established because of the cause.

original: gal te khyad par can dang khyad par gyi shes pa dag rnam par dbye nus na ni chad mar yang 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te khyad par can dang khyad par gyi shes pa dag rnam par dbye nus na ni chad mar yang 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: If the cognition of the specific and the cognition of the difference can be distinguished, then the cognition of the specific would be valid knowledge.

original: gal te rnam pa med pa nyid kyis rnam par dbye bar bya mi nus pa de'i tshe ni khyad par gyi shes pa tshad mar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te rnam pa med pa nyid kyis rnam par dbye bar bya mi nus pa de'i tshe ni khyad par gyi shes pa tshad mar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But if, because of the absence of aspects, they cannot be distinguished, then the cognition of the difference would not be valid knowledge.

original: gzhan yang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa yul tha dad pa du ma nyid 'gal ba yang yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa yul tha dad pa du ma nyid 'gal ba yang yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is contradictory for the object of proof and the proof to have many different objects.

original: 'di ltar 'degs pa dang 'bab pa'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i ste'u de ni dha ba la sogs pa yod la /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'degs pa dang 'bab pa'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i ste'u de ni dha ba la sogs pa yod la /
translated: In this way, the ax that possesses the action of lifting and falling exists in the wood and so on.

original: tshad ma'i bsgrub par bya ba ni de las gzhan la 'grub pa ma yin pa de bzhin du 'dir khyad par gzhan nyid ni de'i shes pas gzung ba yin la /
analyzed: tshad ma'i bsgrub par bya ba ni de las gzhan la 'grub pa ma yin pa de bzhin du 'dir khyad par gzhan nyid ni de'i shes pas gzung ba yin la /
translated: The object of proof by valid knowledge is not established in anything other than that. In the same way, here the difference itself is apprehended by the cognition of that,

original: khyad par can gyi shes pas gzung ba yang gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir na 'di ni nyams pa yin te /
analyzed: khyad par can gyi shes pas gzung ba yang gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir na 'di ni nyams pa yin te /
translated: and that which is apprehended by the cognition of the specific is also different. Therefore this is a fault.

original: rgyu des na khyad par gyi shes pa ni tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu des na khyad par gyi shes pa ni tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the cognition of the specific is not a valid cognition.

original: ci ste nyes pa 'dir ma gyur cig ces khyad par dang khyad par can gyi shes pa dag yul tha dad pa nyid du khas len te /
analyzed: ci ste nyes pa 'dir ma gyur cig ces khyad par dang khyad par can gyi shes pa dag yul tha dad pa nyid du khas len te /
translated: If you accept that the cognition of the specific and the cognition of the thing possessing the specific are different objects, then this fault does not arise.

original: de yul tha dad pa med pa gang yin pa de nyid du khas len na ni gnyis don med do //
analyzed: de yul tha dad pa med pa gang yin pa de nyid du khas len na ni gnyis don med do //
translated: If you accept that they are not different objects, then there is no point in having two.

original: don dang bral ba yin no //
analyzed: don dang bral ba yin no //
translated: They are devoid of meaning.

original: khyad par gyi shes pa nyid kyis don rtogs pa 'grub pa'i phyir khyad par can gyi shes pa ni cung zad kyang byed par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par gyi shes pa nyid kyis don rtogs pa 'grub pa'i phyir khyad par can gyi shes pa ni cung zad kyang byed par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Since the cognition of the specific itself establishes the apprehension of the object, the cognition of the thing possessing the specific does not do anything at all.

original: 'dis ni lta ba dang khyad par can gyi rnam par rtog pa dag kyang yul gcig pa nyid yin na gnyis don med pa @137b yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni lta ba dang khyad par can gyi rnam par rtog pa dag kyang yul gcig pa nyid yin na gnyis don med pa @137b yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: This also shows that if the conceptual cognition of seeing and the conceptual cognition of the thing possessing the specific have the same object, then there is no point in having two.

original: gzhan yang rgyu tha dad pa med pa dag ni rim gyis 'byung ba de bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang rgyu tha dad pa med pa dag ni rim gyis 'byung ba de bkag pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, the arising of the two in sequence is refuted by the fact that they do not have different causes.

original: khyad par can dang khyad par gyi shes pa'i rgyu ni yul yin na /
analyzed: khyad par can dang khyad par gyi shes pa'i rgyu ni yul yin na /
translated: The cause of the qualified and the cognition of the qualified is the object.

original: rgyu gcig las ni rim pa can gnyis 'byung bar rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu gcig las ni rim pa can gnyis 'byung bar rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not reasonable that two sequential things should arise from a single cause,

original: 'bras bu med par nus pa ni sdod par mi rigs pa'i phyir dang / mi nus na yang lhan cig byed pa la ma ltos pa 'bras bu byed par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu med par nus pa ni sdod par mi rigs pa'i phyir dang / mi nus na yang lhan cig byed pa la ma ltos pa 'bras bu byed par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not reasonable that a potency should remain without an effect, and because it is not reasonable that an effect should be produced by a cause that does not depend on cooperating conditions.

original: 'di snyam du khyad par can dang khyad par can gyi shes pa dag cig car 'byung ba des na rgyu tha dad pa med kyang nyes pa med do snyam na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du khyad par can dang khyad par can gyi shes pa dag cig car 'byung ba des na rgyu tha dad pa med kyang nyes pa med do snyam na /
translated: If you think that the qualified and the cognition of the qualified occur simultaneously, and that therefore there is no fault even though there is no difference in their causes,

original: de ltar na ni 'o na cig car 'byung ba la ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa nyid mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de ltar na ni 'o na cig car 'byung ba la ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa nyid mi 'thad do //
translated: then in that case, it is not tenable that they are the object to be established and the means of establishing, because they occur simultaneously.

original: cig car skye ba dag la ni phan gdags bya 'dogs byed kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir g-yas phyogs dang cig shos kyi rva bzhin du rgyu dang 'bras bu yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: cig car skye ba dag la ni phan gdags bya 'dogs byed kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir g-yas phyogs dang cig shos kyi rva bzhin du rgyu dang 'bras bu yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because there is no relation of the benefited and the benefactor between things that arise simultaneously, like the right and left horns of an ox, they do not exist as cause and effect.

original: de'i phyir de lta bur yul tha dad pa'i shes pa gnyis la ni bsgrub par bya ba dang byed pa med la yul gcig nyid yin na ni gnyis pa don med pa dang rim gyis 'byung bar mi 'thad pa dang / cig car la bsgrub bya sgrub byed kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir ji ltar rigs par rig pa can rnams kyi khyad par can dang khyad par gyi shes pa dang dpyod pa po rnams kyi don la lta ba dang /
analyzed: de'i phyir de lta bur yul tha dad pa'i shes pa gnyis la ni bsgrub par bya ba dang byed pa med la yul gcig nyid yin na ni gnyis pa don med pa dang rim gyis 'byung bar mi 'thad pa dang / cig car la bsgrub bya sgrub byed kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir ji ltar rigs par rig pa can rnams kyi khyad par can dang khyad par gyi shes pa dang dpyod pa po rnams kyi don la lta ba dang /
translated: Thus, as is appropriate, this should be applied to the knowledge of the specific and the general of the logicians, and to the seeing of objects by the analyzers,

original: khyad par gyi rnam par rtog pa dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: khyad par gyi rnam par rtog pa dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: and to the conceptual thoughts that distinguish the specific and general.

original: ji ste gal te kho bo cag la dus gcig pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: ji ste gal te kho bo cag la dus gcig pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed par mi 'gyur na /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúFor us, because they are simultaneous, there is no probandum and probative sign,‚Äù

original: 'o na khyed kyi cig car ba dang tha dad ma med pa de lta ji ltar bsgrub bya sgrub byed kyi dngos por 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na khyed kyi cig car ba dang tha dad ma med pa de lta ji ltar bsgrub bya sgrub byed kyi dngos por 'gyur zhe na /
translated: then how could your simultaneous and undifferentiated consciousnesses be related as probandum and probative sign?

original: smras pa / shes pa'i cha mi 'dra ba las log pa dang blo'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las log pas 'dra ba dang blo'i rang bzhin nyid du rnam par gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid de dag ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos por 'thad pa yin no
analyzed: smras pa / shes pa'i cha mi 'dra ba las log pa dang blo'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las log pas 'dra ba dang blo'i rang bzhin nyid du rnam par gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid de dag ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos por 'thad pa yin no
translated: Objection: The definition of the object to be established and the means of establishment is tenable as the object to be established and the means of establishment, since they are similar due to the reversal of dissimilar aspects of consciousness and due to the reversal of that which is not the nature of awareness, and they are established as the nature of awareness itself.

original: zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: This is the remainder.

original: rnam par gzhag pas rnam par gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pas rnam par gzhag pa ste /
translated: Established by means of establishment.

original: rnam par 'jog par byed pa dang / rnam par gzhag par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'jog par byed pa dang / rnam par gzhag par bya ba'o //
translated: The one who establishes and that which is to be established.

original: rnam par gzhag pa de gnyis la brten pa de'i dngos po ni de nyid de de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa de gnyis la brten pa de'i dngos po ni de nyid de de'i phyir ro //
translated: The object of that which is based on those two establishments is just that, and therefore

original: don ni 'di yin te /üîΩkho bo cag gi bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa ni bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos por ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang rnam par gzhag 'jog @138a * //
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te / kho bo cag gi bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa ni bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos por ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang rnam par gzhag 'jog @138a * //
translated: this is the meaning.

original: gi dngos po yin no //
analyzed: gi dngos po yin no //
translated: Our object to be established and means of establishment are not the object to be generated and the means of generation, but rather they are the object of establishment and the means of establishment.

original: de'i phyir na cha 'ga' zhig rgyu mtshan du byed nas 'di ni sngon po myong ba'o zhes shes pa la tha snyad du byed pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan gyi cha gcig po de ni tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir na cha 'ga' zhig rgyu mtshan du byed nas 'di ni sngon po myong ba'o zhes shes pa la tha snyad du byed pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan gyi cha gcig po de ni tshad ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, when one takes some part as the reason, the single part that is the reason for the conventional expression ‚ÄúThis is the experience of blue‚Äù in consciousness is the valid cognition.

original: gzhan tha snyad du bya ba'i cha ni 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: gzhan tha snyad du bya ba'i cha ni 'bras bu yin no //
translated: The other part that is the object of the conventional expression is the result.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang byed pa gang yin pa gcig pas so //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang byed pa gang yin pa gcig pas so //
translated: Because the object and the agent are the same.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: smras pa / dngos po ste don dam pa'i rang bzhin tha dad pa med pa ste gcig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: smras pa / dngos po ste don dam pa'i rang bzhin tha dad pa med pa ste gcig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said: Because the thing, that is, the ultimate nature, is undifferentiated, that is, is one.

original: don 'di yin te /
analyzed: don 'di yin te /
translated: This is the point.

original: shes pa'i cha dag ni gcig yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba dang / byed pa bdag nyid gcig par thal bar de yang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: shes pa'i cha dag ni gcig yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba dang / byed pa bdag nyid gcig par thal bar de yang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Because the parts of consciousness are one, it follows that the object and the agent are the same. That is contradictory.

original: bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de nyid ni grub pa yang ma yin na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de nyid ni grub pa yang ma yin na /
translated: If that which is the object of affirmation is not established,üîΩthen what would be the agent of the establishment?

original: gang gi sgrub par byed pa 'gyur zhes gzhan dag de ltar dogs pa la /
analyzed: gang gi sgrub par byed pa 'gyur zhes gzhan dag de ltar dogs pa la /
translated: Others suspect that.

original: bshad pa / de ni de ltar ma yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa / de ni de ltar ma yin te /
translated: NƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds: That is not so.

original: de dag ni gcig ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag ni gcig ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they are not one.

original: gtan tshigs bshad pa /
analyzed: gtan tshigs bshad pa /
translated: The reason is stated:

original: phan tshun ldog par brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos tha dad pa sna tshogs pa de khas blangs pa'i gtan tshigs kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun ldog par brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos tha dad pa sna tshogs pa de khas blangs pa'i gtan tshigs kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the reason of accepting that phenomena are different in nature, imagined to be mutually exclusive.

original: gal te shes pa'i cha de dag don dam pa'i tha dad pa med pa de lta na yang 'dra ba dang don rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ldog pa gzhan la ltos nas brtags pa'i tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te shes pa'i cha de dag don dam pa'i tha dad pa med pa de lta na yang 'dra ba dang don rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ldog pa gzhan la ltos nas brtags pa'i tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though those aspects of consciousness are ultimately not different, still, in dependence on the exclusion of other, they are imagined to be different in the sense of being similar and having the nature of realizing objects.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i tha snyad ni don dam pa pa la brten pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i tha snyad ni don dam pa pa la brten pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The conventions of the probandum and the means of affirmation are not based on the ultimate.

original: 'on kyang brtags pa'i rang bzhin la brten pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang brtags pa'i rang bzhin la brten pa yin no //
translated: Rather, they are based on the nature of the imagined.

original: des na gang la tha dad pa med pa de la ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: des na gang la tha dad pa med pa de la ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa yod pa ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, where there is no difference, there is no probandum and means of affirmation.

original: gang la brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyi bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa yod pa de la ni tha dad pa nyid yin pa'i phyir mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: gang la brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyi bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa yod pa de la ni tha dad pa nyid yin pa'i phyir mi 'gal lo //
translated: If the probandum and the proof exist in the nature of that which is being investigated, then they are not contradictory because they are different.

original: 'di snyam du 'o na ni khyed kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po brtags pa yin par thal la /
analyzed: 'di snyam du 'o na ni khyed kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po brtags pa yin par thal la /
translated: You may think, ‚ÄúIt follows that you have investigated the entities of the probandum and the proof,

original: 'jig rten na don dam pa mthong ba yang yin no zhes dogs pa la bshad pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten na don dam pa mthong ba yang yin no zhes dogs pa la bshad pa /
translated: and you have seen the ultimate in the world.‚Äù

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i tha snyad 'di dngos po la gnas pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i tha snyad 'di dngos po la gnas pa ni ma yin te /
translated: We explain: The conventions of the probandum and the proof do not exist in entities.

original: 'di ltar lha sbyin 'tshed do zhes bya ba la phru ba 'dzugs pa'i bya ba 'tshed pa zhes bya ba byed pa po las ldog pa ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar lha sbyin 'tshed do zhes bya ba la phru ba 'dzugs pa'i bya ba 'tshed pa zhes bya ba byed pa po las ldog pa ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: In the statement ‚ÄúDevadatta cooks,‚Äù the action of cooking, which is the activity of setting the pot on the stove, is not in the slightest bit separate from the agent.
